name: Heimdall
longDescription: Heimdall, guardian of Bifrost, stands guard over the Rainbow Bridge.
description:
Standing over 7 feet tall and muscled as only a god can be, Heimdall keeps
his unsleeping gaze over the Rainbow bridge.  His trusty Gjallor-horn never
leaves his side, and shall remain unwinded until the dread ship Naglfar sails
towards Valhalla on the dawn of Ragnarok.

name: youth dwarven dwarf
longDescription: A young dwarf plays with a toy axe.
description: This is a young but not totally harmless creature.

name: teddy bear
longDescription: A cute and fuzzy teddy bear stands here.
description: This is a tiny little bear with a heart on his chest.

name: doll raggedy anne
longDescription: A raggedy anne doll is sitting here.
description: You see a small little cute rag doll.

name: soldier toy
longDescription: A toy soldier is standing here.
description: The toy is looking for target practice.

name: bear ugly
longDescription: An ugly stuffed bear stands here.
description:
This is obviously a reject from the factory.
He snarls and growls at you.

name: doll old
longDescription: An abused and old doll is here.
description: This doll has been hugged and played with until there is almost nothing left.

name: oldstyle troll
longDescription: A swamp troll charges towards you.
description:
This huge behemoth towers to a height of 15 feet.  He sneers at you
as he approaches and raises two black taloned claws to strike you.

name: nanny
longDescription: An old wrinkled nanny stands here, looking over the little ones.
description:
You see an old dwarven lady who has been hunched over with age.  However, it
appears that there is still some fight left in her.

name: oldstyle troll
longDescription: A green troll attempts to get a hold on you.
description:
This big troll towers several feet over you.  He has a large spear
which he seems to ply with utmost prowess.  He jabs his spear at you
and cackles with glee.

name: guard
longDescription: An armed guard stands here looking lost.
description:
This is a big mean bully who is tired of being lost in this maze.
You suddenly think that you had better flee.

name: oldstyle ogre
longDescription: An ogre stands here getting ready to beat in your face.
description: This mean bastard looks like he could tear you limb from limb.

name: brat spoiled
longDescription: A spoiled brat is crying here.
description:
You see a little tyke who has always gotten what he wanted.  You have the
biggest urge to put him out of his misery.

name: oldstyle fairy dragon
longDescription: A fairy dragon is fluttering around here looking for something to do...
description:
It's a cute little multi-colored dragon...about 2 foot long.
It gracefully dances around your head.

name: oldstyle thing
longDescription: The Swamp Thing shambles about here.  It seems hungry.
description: The Swamp Thing has huge fists, which look like they could pound you flat.

name: oldstyle griffin
longDescription: A large black winged griffin swoops into an attack.
description:
Golden maned and black all over.  It's quite a beautiful creature if not
for the fact it is hungry and is attacking you!

name: oldstyle gnoll
longDescription: There is a mean looking gnoll here.
description: The Gnoll seems annoyed at your presence.

name: oldstyle beast
longDescription: A huge hairy beast shambles towards you with death in his eyes.
description:
This huge beast stands about 20 feet in height and has huge green clawed
appendages.

name: oldstyle beast
longDescription: A rather small beast cringes in terror as it notices you.
description:
This rather small beast looks like you could take it out with a single
sword blow.

name: oldstyle will will-o-wisp
longDescription: A Will-O-Wisp darts hear and there, making fun of you.
description:
This strange little creature seems very hard to keep your eyes on.
You stare as hard as you can at the glowing ball of floating light and
are just able to notice a small pair of glowing eyes.

name: oldstyle keeper
longDescription: The keeper of the Morris equipment is here.
description: Her job is to set the level for this equipment.

name: oldstyle snake anaconda
longDescription: A monstrous snake slithers towards you, thinking 'breakfast'.
description: This 10 meter anaconda looks rather hungry.

name: oldstyle snake python
longDescription: A rather large python rests in a coil here.
description: It's the largest Amazon python you have ever seen.

name: oldstyle hag
longDescription: A Marsh Hag is here.
description:
Yech!  She manages to make even Smurfette look attractive.  That's ok,
because she thinks you stink too, and she's about to do something about it.

name: oldstyle slaad
longDescription: A Death Slaad is standing here distraught.  He seems lost.
description:
This dark apparition stands a meager 13 feet in height.  Even in the dim
swamp light, the blade of his scythe gleams.

name: oldstyle hierophant
longDescription: The old Hierophant of the holy grove is here, gathering hollies.
description:
He is a very old man, dressed in an old robe; but from the glint in his
clear blue eyes you can see that He is aware of the world, and wise to its
traps and pitfalls.

name: oldstyle wolf
longDescription: A marsh wolf sniffs the ground has followed your scent.
description:
This wolf looks plump.  She probably ate a friend or two of yours who came
into the marsh.

name: oldstyle hierophant
longDescription: The old Hierophant of the holy grove is here, gathering ivy.
description:
She is a very old woman, dressed in an old gown; but from the glint in her
clear blue eyes you can see that She is aware of the world, and wise to its
traps and pitfalls.

name: oldstyle mound shambling
longDescription: A heap of garbage shambles towards you.
description: This grotesque pile of plant matter fills you with utmost horror.

name: oldstyle elder druid
longDescription: An elder druid stands here, watching the local flora and wildlife.
description:
He looks ageless, as do all druids.  His grey beard contrasts strongly with
his lack of wrinkles.

name: oldstyle shaman orc
longDescription: An orc shaman stands before you holding a staff and wearing robes.
description:
This old orc has an array of bones stuck in his hair and strange symbols
painted on his face and hands.

name: oldstyle elder druidess
longDescription: An elder druidess stands here, watching the local fauna and feeding rabbits.
description: She looks ageless, as do all druids.  She smiles a beautiful smile at you.

name: oldstyle henry gardener
longDescription: Henry the Gardener is sitting here, looking drunk.
description:
He is a tall but bulky man in his late fifties.  His features are worn with
decades of hard work and his somewhat crouched expression is one of deep
sorrow and depression.  He is haunted by a memory of a lost paradise.

name: oldstyle giant
longDescription: A marsh giant stomps towards you.
description: This huge monster of a man has green gnarly teeth and a BIG stick.

name: oldstyle doe
longDescription: A doe is here, munching on grass.
description:
This peaceful creature looks at you with big dark eyes.  Her nose twitches as
she sniffs at you, but she goes back to chewing some grass.

name: oldstyle zombie
longDescription: A rotting zombie is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.
description: Maggots crawl all over its decaying body.

name: oldstyle gargoyle
longDescription: A large gargoyle lands next to you, baring his fangs at you.
description: This creepy fellow looks like he could use you as a meal.

name: oldstyle deer
longDescription: A deer is here, staring back at you.
description:
The deer looks angered at your intrusion.  He butts his head against you,
albeit ineffectively.

name: oldstyle ghoul
longDescription: A ghastly ghoul is here.
description:
It is a walking corpse with long fangs and long, sharp nails that most of
resemble claws.  Its eyes are a dark yellow colour and glare hungrily at you.

name: oldstyle stag deer large
longDescription: A large deer stag is here, protecting his territory.
description: He eyes you with contained anger.  You'd better leave him alone!

name: oldstyle skeleton
longDescription: A dusty skeleton lies here.
description:
The dusty bones are almost brown.  It must have been buried for a very long
time.

name: oldstyle bunny rabbit
longDescription: A small bunny is here, poking from bush to bush.
description: This bunny looks so adorable, you wished you had one just like this!

name: oldstyle skeleton
longDescription: A dusty skeleton lies here.
description:
The dusty bones are almost brown.  It must have been buried for a very long
time.

name: oldstyle snake
longDescription: A small snake slithers between the grass.
description: Upon careful inspection, you are sure it is NOT a cobra!

name: oldstyle zombie
longDescription: A rotting zombie is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.
description: Maggots crawl all over its decaying body.

name: oldstyle druid
longDescription: A druid is here in meditation.
description: He doesn't like you bothering him, but is too polite to ask you to leave.

name: oldstyle druidess
longDescription: A druidess is here, peering at you.
description: She wonders why you are staring at her, and how you got in here.

name: oldstyle spider young
longDescription: The young spider is ballooning by you.
description:
He looks freshly hatched and sprightly.  His young fangs are just
growing in as of late.

name: oldstyle dragon Yevaud
longDescription: Yevaud the Usurper of Midgaard is here, grinning evilly at you.
description: Old, scaly, but still with a lot of bite in him left.

name: oldstyle spider wolf
longDescription: The Wolf Spider is here, licking its bloody fangs.
description: The Wolf Spider is hairy, very hairy.

name: oldstyle orc
longDescription: The orc is stuck in the web and he can't get out.
description: You notice an evil look in his eyes.

name: oldstyle wasp queen
longDescription:
The Queen Wasp is here, thinking that you would make a tasty offering
to her master.
description: You notice a glazed look in her eyes.

name: oldstyle spider drone
longDescription: The drone spider walks around doing her master's bidding.
description: An ordinary drone spider.

name: oldstyle spider ethereal
longDescription: The ethereal spider strides here, traveling to different worlds.
description: She winks in and out.

name: oldstyle goblin slave
longDescription: A goblin slave lies here asleep.
description: The defenseless goblin begs for mercy.

name: oldstyle slave human
longDescription: The slave works here relentlessly.
description: The slave does not mind you, but will fight like a warrior if attacked.

name: oldstyle drow commoner
longDescription: A drow commoner walks on guard duty.
description: I doubt he is the type to give directions.

name: oldstyle quasit
longDescription: The quasit blinks in and out, grinning at you.
description:
Demoniac in nature, but more mischievous.  He twiddles his thumbs
and creates a magical treasure!

name: oldstyle drow noble warrior
longDescription: The drow warrior noble stands here guarding his home.
description: He looks pissed off!

name: oldstyle spider bird
longDescription: The Bird Spider snaps its powerful jaws.
description: The Bird Spider has very powerful jaws.

name: oldstyle drow noble mage
longDescription: The drow mage noble is here protecting his home.
description: The mage prepares to cast a spell ... at you!!

name: oldstyle hermit
longDescription: The Hermit sits here and warns, "Go back before it's too late!"
description:
A dishevelled veteran warrior in disguise is what he is, but he
means well.

name: oldstyle drow priestess
longDescription: The drow priestess is here shouting orders.
description: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!

name: oldstyle donjonkeeper
longDescription: The Donjonkeeper eyes you and wonders how pure your soul is.
description: He delves deeper into you as you stare at him.

name: oldstyle drow master
longDescription: The drow master stares at you angrily.
description: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.

name: oldstyle guardian
longDescription: The guardian is obviously not doing his job.
description: He looks like a lazy bum who sleeps half the time.

name: oldstyle drow weapons master
longDescription: The drow weapons master is here shadow boxing.
description: He definitely knows his way around in combat.

name: oldstyle spider empress arachnos
longDescription: Arachnos the Empress of Spiders welcomes you with an evil smile.
description:
She is a very attractive spider with an ornate gown.  She tempts you
into being one of her many slaves.  She does not possess the venomous
fangs of normal spiders, but then, as you realize, she does not need
them.

name: oldstyle drow matron mother
longDescription: The matron mother of the house is standing here.
description: She looks really pissed off!

name: oldstyle ki-rin
longDescription: The Ki-Rin smiles good-naturedly to you.
description:
She is the last bastion of good in this realm.  Her mission is to
someday free the slaves of the Empress.

name: oldstyle drow matron mother
longDescription: The matron mother of the 1st house is waiting for you.
description: She looks like she is about to rip your head off and eat it.

name: oldstyle dragon wormkin young
longDescription: A wormkin with no teeth plays here.
description: Rather small, you almost feel sad in killing it.

name: oldstyle yochlol
longDescription: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist.
description: The yochlol is not in a good mood.

name: oldstyle dragon wormkin medium
longDescription: A wormkin that has grown a bit stares at you inquisitively.
description: A medium-sized dragon--seems it hasn't killed anything yet by itself.

name: oldstyle drow guard
longDescription: The drow guard is here staring at you ominously.
description: The drow guard blends so well with his environment, you barely see his form.

name: oldstyle juve
longDescription: A juve is standing here plotting mischief.
description:
He is a tall, thin boy.  He is looking for his gang mates.  He and his
mates have cost city authorities many millions of creds a week in
vandalism repairs.

name: oldstyle dwarf guard
longDescription: A dwarven guard is here.
description: The guard looks very tough and mean.

name: oldstyle spider poisonous
longDescription: A huge, poisonous spider is here.
description:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a human crawling on all four.  It
has eight hairy legs that gives it a tremendous speed on almost any surface and
sharp poisonous fangs to paralyze or kill its prey.

name: oldstyle drow scout
longDescription: The drow scout is here sneaking among the shadows.
description: The drow scout blends so well with her environment, you barely see her form.

name: oldstyle punk
longDescription: A punk is here plotting a crime wave.
description:
This punk is from one of the rowdiest, scruffiest, and definitely most
fashionable of all gangs -- the Grunge Mongers.

name: oldstyle dwarf worker miner
longDescription: A dwarven mining worker is here.
description: He is very dirty, and looks extremely over-worked.

name: oldstyle queen spider
longDescription: The huge, bulky Queen Spider is here.
description:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a small elephant.  It has eight
huge, hairy legs that would give it a tremendous speed on almost any surface
if it wasn't so immensely fat.  Its large, bulbous eyes stare back at you.

name: oldstyle Futsie
longDescription: A Futsie is here reciting Monty Python sketches.
description:
A sad victim of Future Shock, this man is immensely dangerous and will
not be stopped by anyone who tries to deter him from revenge upon the
Justice Department.

name: oldstyle wraith
longDescription: A wraith is awaiting your first move here.
description: A black, almost transparent wraith.

name: oldstyle Citi-Def Militiaman
longDescription: A Citi-Def Militiaman is here contemplating a Block War.
description:
A member of a local Block's Citi-Def militia, this man is well-armed
and undersupervised.

name: oldstyle storekeeper
longDescription: There is the Hide & Tooth storekeeper standing here, waiting patiently.
description: The storekeeper is very rotund, but looks like a sharp guy.

name: oldstyle dunk
longDescription: A dunk is here blending into the crowd.
description: He blends into the crowd as his hand travels into another citizen's pocket.

name: oldstyle baker
longDescription: Granite Head, the baker, is waiting for a customer here.
description: Granite Head is covered with flour and grains.

name: oldstyle dervish raggity
longDescription: The raggity dervish walks on aimlessly.
description:
Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use
some rest.

name: oldstyle tap
longDescription: A tap is here eyeing your belongings.
description:
A practitioner in Mega-City One's largest growth industry, mugging, is
looking you over for a possible business transaction.

name: oldstyle lizard
longDescription: A giant lizard is here.
description:
This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to it's underground
habitat.  He looks very powerful.

name: oldstyle dervish large
longDescription: The large dervish watches for signs of trouble.
description:
Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use
LOTS of rest.

name: oldstyle rookie judge
longDescription: A Rookie judge is on his first beat here.
description:
A member of Mega-City One's Justice Department is here considering what
crimes you have committed.  Being a rookie he will probably be easier on
you though.

name: oldstyle giant
longDescription: A giant is here.
description: The giant is about 8 feet tall, with arms of steel, and looks very strong.

name: oldstyle snake coral
longDescription: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.
description:
This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow
and black.

name: oldstyle Wallaby Gleep
longDescription: Mr. Gleep is here wanting to know what you want.
description:
Wallaby Gleep is a heavy-set man who gives you the impression that he is
unintelligent and unimaginative, but looks can be deceiving.

name: oldstyle dwarf miner
longDescription: A dwarven miner is here.
description: The mineworker is very tired, and very dirty, and he has bulging muscles.

name: oldstyle scorpion small
longDescription: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.
description: The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature.

name: oldstyle Pinkerton Throt
longDescription: Pinky Throt is here Wringing his hands.
description:
He is a thin angular crook, pretty close to everyone's idea of Ebeneezer
Scrooge.  Indeed, the only thing guaranteed to bring a spark to his dead
eyes is the mention of money.

name: oldstyle dwarf leader
longDescription: A dwarven mine leader is here.
description: The mine leader is very big and very strong.

name: oldstyle worm giant purple
longDescription: A giant, purple sand worm thrusts up out of the sand and attacks!
description: He's big, mean, and purple. Watch out!

name: oldstyle Ernie Ramirez
longDescription: Ernie Ramirez is here collecting for the mob.
description:
Ramirez is a dour man who knows that he's never going to get a better
deal out of life.  He is content to run the bite fights for Throt and
Gleep.

name: oldstyle dwarf doctor
longDescription: The dwarven doctor is here.
description: He is a very skilled surgeon, with hands of steel.

name: oldstyle dragon brass
longDescription:
The brass dragon steps out of the darkness and says 'Hello'.
Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!'

name: oldstyle Judge Eckersely
longDescription: Judge Eckersely is here shaking down a Perp.
description:
He is a dedicated, if somewhat pessimistic Judge.  He is the Senior Judge
of the Downtown Quadrant.

name: oldstyle dwarf peon
longDescription: A dwarven peon is awaiting help here.

name: oldstyle nomad leader
longDescription: The nomad leader sits silently in prayer.
description:
He is clad in silk robes lined with gold thread. At his side
is a large, engraved cutlass. He has an especially haughty air
about him.

name: oldstyle Judge Beddows
longDescription: Judge Beddows is here calling Resyk.
description:
Beddows is a clone from the same stock as the ex-Chief Judge McGruder.
She is fanatically dedicated to her job and has no ambitions other than
to enforce the LAW.

name: oldstyle dwarf
longDescription: A grinning dwarf is here.

name: oldstyle nomad commander
longDescription: The nomad commander stands here staring suspiciously at you.
description:
This is the nomad leader's second in command. His clothes are richly
woven of silk and gold thread. A nasty cutlass hangs at his side.

name: oldstyle bite fighter
longDescription: A bite fighter is here sharpening his teeth.
description: A bite fighter is here with sharpened teeth and a bad attitude.

name: oldstyle dwarf son
longDescription: An unwanted son is here.  You feel sorry for the guy.

name: oldstyle nomad warrior
longDescription: A proud nomad warrior stands here.

name: oldstyle dwarf daughter
longDescription: An unwanted daughter is here.  You feel sorry for her.

name: oldstyle slave young
longDescription: A young slave sits here staring at you with pleading eyes.

name: oldstyle dracolich lich
longDescription: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.
description:
The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it.
Obviously it no longer fears death.

name: oldstyle dwarf guard
longDescription: A barrack guard is here.

name: oldstyle hatchling dragon baby
longDescription: A dragon hatchling is here, chewing on a bone.
description:
This small dragon hisses at you as you enter the room.  Although it is only a
few feet long, its sharp teeth make you think twice about petting it.

name: oldstyle drider drow
longDescription: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

name: oldstyle man
longDescription: A man in waiting is here.  He looks nervous and unsure of himself.

name: oldstyle harpy
longDescription: The screaming, filthy harpy claws madly at your face!
description:
The harpy looks at you with blood in her eyes.  Her entire body is
caked in filth and grime and she stinks to high heaven.  Her razor-
sharp talons flex as she considers you for her dinner.

name: oldstyle draconian
longDescription: The Draconian is standing here.
description:
This horrible creature is a bizarre cross between a man and a dragon.  He
has black scales and a seven foot wingspan.  He scowls at you and hefts his
spear as you enter the room.

name: oldstyle duergar dwarf
longDescription: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.
description: The duergar could crush your head as easily as it does those rocks.

name: oldstyle mazekeeper
longDescription: A mazekeeper is here.
description: He looks VERY tough.

name: oldstyle harpy leader
longDescription: The screaming harpy leader tries to scratch your eyes out!
description:
The harpy leader looks at you and grins menacingly.  She stretches
her wings and you see insects crawling around them.  Her hair is
matted and greasy and you are sickened by the stench that pervades
her presence.

name: oldstyle lord crypt master
longDescription: The lord of this crypt is here.
description: He doesn't look happy to see you.

name: oldstyle myconoid
longDescription: A myconoid lumbers along peacefully.
description:
The myconoid looks something like a giant mushroom (and probably
has the same effect).

name: oldstyle bat
longDescription: A bat flaps wildly at you!
description: Your typical smelly, blind flying mammal.

name: oldstyle snake
longDescription: There is a giant snake here.

name: oldstyle air elemental
longDescription: The ghostly air elemental.
description:
The air elemental is hard to see.  You know that it is there
because objects behind it seem to waver and are slightly blurred.

name: oldstyle john lumberjack
longDescription: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
description:
He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy,
chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is
one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.

name: oldstyle man mage wizard
longDescription: A man is here, studying some books.
description:
A powerful looking mage is standing in this room studying his spells.  You are
surprised at the fact that he is human, and realize that he must be very
powerful to have been accepted by the creatures which live here.

name: oldstyle myconoid shaman
longDescription: A rather large myconoid stands here chanting in a strange tongue.
description: The shaman shoots spores into the air.

name: oldstyle page templar
longDescription: A templar page in training is here looking mildly confused.
description: He has lost his family and everything of his former life.

name: oldstyle mysterious efreeti
longDescription: The mysterious efreeti grins in delight at its new prey.
description:
The efreeti towers menacingly over you.  It is dressed in the
finest ghostly silks and a headdress with an elaborate brooch.

name: oldstyle cleric draconian
longDescription: A Draconian is here, deep in thought.
description:
A Draconian stands here, dressed in simple robes.  Around his neck you
notice a golden medallion in the shape of a five headed dragon.

name: oldstyle bear
longDescription: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
description:
The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp
teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little thingies from toy shops at all.

name: oldstyle spelunker explorer
longDescription: A spelunker knows his way around these tunnels.
description:
He recently discovered these catacombs and wants to see where they lead.
He just hopes he doesn't get killed in the process.  He carries only
essential exploration gear; if there IS anything down here, he
probably won't last long.

name: oldstyle dustdigger
longDescription: A small oasis invites you to dive in.

name: oldstyle roc
longDescription: The gigantic roc.
description:
This bird has a wingspan that stretches several spear-lengths.  It
moves surprisingly fast for something of its size.~

name: oldstyle poor mudder
longDescription: A poor mudder, lost in this place.
description: You will become him if you are not careful.

name: oldstyle king draconian
longDescription: A Draconian wearing fine clothes is here, pondering his greatness.
description:
The king of the draconians sits here on a golden throne.  He looks as
though he could crush your head with a single blow.  Yet you sense that he
is controlled by a greater power.

name: oldstyle rabbit
longDescription: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
description:
This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by
the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent
rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.

name: oldstyle gravedigger digger robber graverobber
longDescription: A graverobber uncovers dead bodies.
description:
Working for an evil necromancer isn't the greatest thing in the world.
They seem like little more than zombie servants themselves.

name: oldstyle camel
longDescription: A very dangerous rabid camel snorts at you.
description: Don't mess with this animal.

name: oldstyle roc
longDescription: The gigantic roc stares menacingly at you.
description:
This bird has a wingspan that stretches several spear-lengths.  It
moves surprisingly fast for something of its size.

name: oldstyle star
longDescription: A beautiful white star smiles at you.
description: You can't tell what the star looks like, she is too bright!

name: oldstyle concubine draconian
longDescription: A concubine is resting here.
description:
This is a concubine of the king.  She is lounging here, wearing nothing at
all.  You find yourself strangely repulsed as she draws a knife and
prepares to defend herself.

name: oldstyle deer
longDescription: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
description:
She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes
looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.

name: oldstyle mist swirling
longDescription: Some mist swirls about you here ... it seems ALIVE!
description: In fact it IS alive in a magical sort of sense.

name: oldstyle wicked witch
longDescription: The ugly, wicked witch cackles maniacally.
description:
The witch has jet black hair and sickly green skin.  She is covered
with warts and boils.  Her nails are long and sharp and look like
they would be quite painful.  Her eyes pierce your very soul.

name: oldstyle skeleton bony
longDescription: A bony skeleton is here.
description:
Brown bones with tufts of clothing still hanging from them.  This
skeleton looks very mindless but still dangerous ...

name: oldstyle nebula young
longDescription: A young nebula, waiting to become a star.
description: It hasn't got a definite shape, it is just a cloud of mist.

name: oldstyle bodyguard draconian
longDescription: A bodyguard is here, staring at you menacingly.
description:
This creature has devoted its life to defending the king.  Your intrusion has
not pleased it.

name: oldstyle fox
longDescription: A brown fox is here, looking for some rabbits to chew up.
description: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick brush.

name: oldstyle undead zombie
longDescription: An undead zombie sits here munching on something ...
description:
His body is totally white and slowly rotting away.  Each Zombie looks
quite different from the next because they were, of course, once alive and
human.

name: oldstyle tiamat dragon
longDescription: A five headed dragon hisses at you as you enter this room.
description:
You see before you the master of this Tower, Tiamat.  She frowns at you as she
prepares to make you pay for your insolence ... with your lives!

name: oldstyle comet speedy
longDescription: A speedy comet is waiting to crush your head in.
description: You see the offspring of Halley's comet, here just to wipe everything out.

name: oldstyle warg vicious
longDescription: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

name: oldstyle skeleton skeletal soldier
longDescription: A skeletal soldier fights in the battle of the underworld.
description:
Even though he has died in the physical sense of the word, the battle
continues for him in his charmed state.

name: oldstyle undead ghoul
longDescription: A ghoul is here staring at you hungrily.
description:
The ghoul no longer resembles the adventurer he once was.  Nonetheless
he looks like he hasn't forgot his fighting skills.

name: oldstyle dragon red
longDescription: A red dragon is here, contemplating your existence.
description:
This huge red dragon dominates the chamber.  As you turn to flee, he grins at
you and invites you to stay ... forever!

name: oldstyle red supergiant
longDescription: An enormous, red supergiant is forced to protect the galaxy.
description:
You notice the giant is not as tough as his name sounds ...
Still he can be very powerful.

name: oldstyle warg ferocious
longDescription: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

name: oldstyle templar
longDescription: A templar shouts "AKK! SLAY THE INFIDEL!"
description:
As you peer closely he peers back at you

A templar peers closely at you.
A templar tells you, "You are an evil force trying to spread your ways!".
A templar tells you, "You must die for your sin!".

name: oldstyle undead wraith
longDescription: You spot a wraith advancing towards you from the shadows.
description:
The wraith no longer has a material form.  He is wearing a tattered
black robe which hides all but the darkness of his face and the glimmer
in his eyes.

name: oldstyle white dwarf
longDescription: A tiny white dwarf is trying to sneak away from duty.
description:
Like the red giant, he is also appointed to stand guard for the galaxy.
But somehow he manages to escape.  Though tiny, it can take a lot of hits!

name: oldstyle dragon black
longDescription: A black dragon is here, laughing at your insolence.
description:
This huge black wyrm laughs at your puny weapons.  You realize that he is not
going to roll over and die for you.

name: oldstyle wraith
longDescription: A mysterious ghostly wraith forms before your eyes.
description: Hard to tell much about the mysterious form even upon further inspection.

name: oldstyle wolf grey
longDescription: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
description: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

name: oldstyle undead guardian vampire
longDescription: A vampire is here hiding his face from your light source.
description:
The guardian vampire looks quite EVIL.  Just by looking at him the hair on your
arms raises. He looks mighty tough to be just a minor minion.

name: oldstyle horsehead nebula
longDescription: A huge nebula is here, resembling a horsehead.
description:
You can only make out its shape from the darkness.  He was cursed to stay in
here and his face may never be seen by anyone again.

name: oldstyle dragon white
longDescription: A white dragon is here, waiting for you.
description:
This dragon towers over you.  Recalling your previous experiences with white
dragons, you are not afraid.  She smiles at you and says 'I think you will find
me a greater challenge than my offspring.'

name: oldstyle officer templar
longDescription: A templar officer keeps an eye on things here.
description: A templar officer tells you "Better move along evil one!"

name: oldstyle wolf black
longDescription: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
description: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

name: oldstyle priest
longDescription: A priest of God stands here solemnly speaking words of praise.
description:
Obviously a goodly man, you feel closer to God just by gazing upon this man.
Dressed in white, fine white hair, and a soft slightly wrinkled face ...
this man has a sacred beauty.  You see a halo around his head.

name: oldstyle andromeda
longDescription: The poor Andromeda is chained to the wall, suffering ...
description:
She was once a princess of beauty.  However, her beauty has led to a Goddess's
jealousy and she has to suffer here endlessly until Perseus comes.

name: oldstyle dragon green
longDescription: A green dragon is here, looking distraught.
description:
This huge beast appears to be the most directly related to the draconians.
She looks at you with sorrow in her eyes and says 'You have slaughtered my
children.  Prepare to die.'

name: wyvern
longDescription: A monstrous wyvern slowly circles just above your head.
description:
This huge winged creature looks really menacing.  You are happy it doesn't
APPEAR to be very hungry ... yet.

name: oldstyle zombie mage
longDescription: A blank-faced zombie mage joins the battle.
description: He seems to lack real interest in what he is doing.

name: oldstyle dragon green
longDescription: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
description:
This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its
colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as does
the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only dragons
do.

name: oldstyle Mi-Go Fungi
longDescription: A Mi-Go is crawling here.
description:
Mi-Go, the Fungi from Yuggoth ... it is a pinkish being about five feet long;
with a crustaceous body bearing a vast pair of membranous wings and several
sets of articulate limbs, body a sort of convoluted ellipsoid, covered with
multitudes of very small antennae, where a head would ordinarily be.  These
beings sometimes walk on all their legs and sometimes on the hind pair only.

name: oldstyle hercules
longDescription: The Mighty Hercules is working hard on his extra Labours for the Gods.
description:
He has been put to do the Ten Labours -- ten impossible tasks, by Hera, the
queen goddess, who disliked him.  But he finished them all and at the end was
granted immortality. He is a very brave and strong fighter.

name: goblin mountain
longDescription: A mountain goblin is wandering about, mumbling to himself.
description: You see before you a small and twisted creature with knotted muscles.

name: oldstyle hydra
longDescription: A hydra is here, blocking the doorway.
description:
A hydra is here, guarding the entrance to a sealed vault.  You have the feeling
it isn't happy to see you.

name: oldstyle shadow shadows
longDescription: Eerie shadows fill the room.
description: Looks vaguely you-shaped.

name: oldstyle shargugh brownie
longDescription: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
description:
This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and long
tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks as if
he is having great fun.

name: boy small
longDescription: A small boy sits here, licking his wounds.
description:
The poor boy has numerous cuts and scratches, but appears to be all right.
He is apparently the only survivor of the ambush.

name: oldstyle pegasus
longDescription: The wild pegasus is grazing peacefully.
description: It is the legendary horse with wings on its back.

name: oldstyle nightgaunt
longDescription: A nightgaunt is standing here
description:
... shocking and uncouth black thing with smooth, oily, skin, unpleasant horns
that curve inward toward each other, bat wings whose beating make no sound,
ugly prehensile paws, and a barbed tail that lashes disquietingly.  And worst
of all, it makes absolutely no sound or speech and smiles not at all because
it has no face, only a suggestive blackness where a face ought to be ...

name: oldstyle slave human
longDescription: A Human slave is here, hard at work.
description:
He looks like he's under a lot of stress.  He would probably like it if you
left him alone.

name: mountain climber mountainclimber
longDescription: A mountain climber is making the same trek that you are.
description: He wants to see what's on the other side of the mountain too.

name: oldstyle elder druid
longDescription: The elder druid is here ... he looks very upset at your presence in his home.
description:
The druid looks quite old.  You would think him venerable, but you know
he would be a tough foe.

name: oldstyle bat vampire
longDescription: A bat flaps wildly at you!
description: A rather LARGE "bat" ...

name: oldstyle orion
longDescription: Orion is still hunting for Scorpio.
description:
He is the legendary hunter who almost defeated Taurus the bull, but got
killed by Scorpio.  The gods put them both up as constellations but one
appears on one side of the sky and the other the other side so they will
never meet.

name: innkeeper
longDescription: The Innkeeper stands here, cleaning glasses.
description:
The Innkeeper now spends most of his days waiting for customers, while the
nights are spent watching out for goblins.  His inn is no longer the happy
place that is used to be in days past.

name: oldstyle zombie draconian
longDescription: A Draconian zombie is here, staring at nothing in particular.
description:
This used to be one of the warriors of this tribe.  He was denied his final
rest, however, and now guards this corridor tirelessly as a zombie.

name: oldstyle hunting horror
longDescription: The hunting horror is here in wait of an unwary traveler.
description:
Serving Nyarlathotep and Roch'tar, these beings are hunting for victims.
They resemble enormous ropy black serpents or worms possessing bat-like or
umbrella-like wings.  Their forms continually shift and change, twitching
and writhing, so it is hard to look at them.  They speak in great harsh
voices.  A hunting horror is HUGE, normally around 40 feet long.

name: cyclops
longDescription: A hungry cyclops snarls at you!
description: He looks like he's about to have dinner (maybe it's you?).

name: oldstyle necromancer necro cleric
longDescription: The evil necromancer makes undead soldiers from corpses.
description:
Though he seems absorbed in his work, you'd bet he'd take the time out
to kill you to get a fresh corpse!

name: bard
longDescription: A sullen bard is here, drinking away his problems.
description:
You can smell the alcohol on his breath from across the room.  This poor bard
has been sitting here quite a while, drinking himself into oblivion.

name: oldstyle dragon phase
longDescription: A Phase Dragon is darting around the room.
description: This small dragon looks like he's up to no good.

name: oldstyle pleiades
longDescription: The Pleiades are here, weeping for the loss of their sisters.
description:
These are the seven sisters of the Myths, and as for why they are here, no
one knows; even the Gods themselves have forgotten.

name: oldstyle weeds
longDescription: Some weeds are creeping across the floor.
description: Just some unpleasant looking vine-like growths ...

name: oldstyle tiny elemental
longDescription: A tiny elemental form wanders about.
description: Rather small for an elemental form, looks like a reject.

name: oldstyle grand templar leader
longDescription: The grand templar stands here quietly observing your actions
description:
A slight, tolerant smile comes briefly across his face.  In the blink
of an eye he seems stern again.

name: horseman dark
longDescription: A dark horseman is here, mounted on his black steed.
description:
The man is obviously an outlaw, and has no qualms about slashing you into
little bits.

name: oldstyle fool draconian
longDescription: A Fool is here, making fun of you.
description:
This dragon man looks VERY foolish, dressed in a green and blue striped
suit.  As you enter the room, he points at you and laughs.

name: oldstyle snapper joe
longDescription: Snapper Joe is standing here leering at you chillingly.
description:
What an ugly fiend! He is about 6'6'' and has mostly greenish skin with
bright red hair. Half his face is burnt off and he has a perpetual smile.
He is called up from his service in hell in order to aid the Undying One.

name: oldstyle elemental guardian
longDescription: The elemental guardian of the canyon.
description: You can't tell which kind of elemental it is, maybe it's a bit o' all of them?

name: oldstyle draco head
longDescription: The gigantic Head of Draco lurks out from beneath and prepares to roast you.
description:
This evil-looking head is even larger than a giant.  He is the last guardian
before entering the inner galaxy.  His neck is flexing in a random fashion so
hitting the head is certainly not easy.

name: oldstyle prism dragon prismdragon
longDescription: The light shines off a beautiful but dangerous dragon lurking here.
description: The spray of colored light bouncing off his scales is almost blinding.

name: goblin lieutenant
longDescription: A goblin lieutenant stands here, attempting to get his men in order.
description:
The goblin lieutenant is rather angry, and looking for one of his men to
beat up upon, but maybe you will do just fine ...

name: oldstyle queen draconian
longDescription: A Female Draconian sits, here, looking very important.
description:
This draconian looks VERY busy as she orders her slaves around.  You think
it might be a good idea to leave her alone.

name: oldstyle small elemental
longDescription: A small, rather non-descript elemental.
description: A small elemental, a resident of the canyon.

name: oldstyle draco baby
longDescription: A baby draco is crawling on the Draco's body.
description:
You see a tiny creature which looks like a dragon except that its body
resembles a snake.  Gosh, is this a draco, you wonder, is this the thing
we are on now?

name: oldstyle X-ist eater
longDescription: An X-ist flesh eater is sitting here munching on some coffin remains
description:
A large hairy monstrous beast, the only LIVE thing you have seen down here.
It stands approximately 8 feet tall and hunches over to fit in this
small room.  It has a pair of tremendous claws that it uses to rip and tear.
It has dog-like face except ... different.  Bright glowing eyes and a grimace
lead you to believe that he knew that you were coming.

name: oldstyle darken dark beast darkenbeast
longDescription: You hear and smell the presence of the darkenbeast.
description: You see nothing more than the sense of darkness and evil.

name: goblin leader
longDescription: The goblin leader surveys the room.
description:
The leader doesn't look too happy that you have found him here.  He grabs
for his shortsword and lunges for your neck.

name: oldstyle aries
longDescription: Aries is sitting here, welcoming you.
description:
You see a white goat here, the first guardian of the Zodiac,
also the ruler of Spring. He looks as if he is expecting you.

name: oldstyle medium elemental
longDescription: A medium-sized elemental.
description: A medium elemental, a resident of the canyon.

name: oldstyle spirit ghost king crotus
longDescription: The spirit of King Crotus is floating lazily above the floor.
description:
Floating above the ground here and looking a bit dead, he whispers
softly into the air:

The forces of evil have unlocked my spirit as
well as one other.  Free me from this misery,
anyone that can hear. The peace of the grave
calls me but I am blocked from its quiet.

name: oldstyle rock slug
longDescription: A rock slug is slowly creeping along, leaving a slime trail behind it.
description: It is a large brownish slug.  Got any salt?  Didn't think so ...

name: oldstyle large elemental
longDescription: A large elemental.
description:
A large elemental, a resident of the canyon.~
human~
ABG 0 20 0
15 0 3d9+208 7d9+100 2d6+3 none
-2 -2 -2 7
EFNU 0 0 0
stand stand none 100
0 0 medium 0

name: oldstyle taurus
longDescription: Taurus wants to leave, but has been forced to stay as a guardian here.
description:
You see a wild-looking bull with a bad temper.  He is well-built and looks like
he can fight well ... indeed he has fought with Orion before and survived.

name: oldstyle etcher
longDescription: The mad etcher is sitting here babbling to himself and working on the wall.
description:
Quite insane, the mad etcher has been here for two decades.  His hair is
white; he babbles nonsense to himself; a layer of dust covers his out-of-date
clothing; and he seems to be working on the same portion of the wall near
the base ... oh and he seems quite blind.

He leers insanely at you and says 'heh heh what can I do for you children?
Please don't mind my wife, she is always like that ... hello dear can you
make some tea for our company?  Oh good!  Now sit right down will you?
Would you like hot or cold tea?  Yes the weather is ...'

And on he babbles ...

name: oldstyle gemini
longDescription: Gemini is looking for his brother; have you seen him?
description:
As soon as you see him you know that he is the most perfect man you have seen.
You can't find any imperfections on him.

name: oldstyle earth elemental ruler
longDescription: The Ruler of the earth elementals.
description:
He looks as old as the earth itself.  He seems to know all the
secrets and knowledge of the Earth.  You can't really tell where
he begins and the rock wall ends.

name: oldstyle wife ghost specter
longDescription: The spectral wife of the etcher is very faintly floating here.
description:
You can barely make her out ... though it almost makes you vomit.
She is missing half her head.  The remaining half is smashed in horribly like
she took a nasty fall.  Her one damaged eye hangs on its own.  She smiles
insanely at you thru a broken jaw and missing teeth.  One hand of hers is
resting on the shoulder of the etcher ... her husband.

name: oldstyle gemini
longDescription: Gemini is hiding from his brother, grinning evilly at you.
description:
As soon as you see him you see the most imperfect man you have ever seen.
How can there be such a contrast?  You wonder ...

name: oldstyle fire elemental ruler
longDescription: The Ruler of the fire elementals.
description: As you look at him he seems to blend in with the fire in his throne.

name: oldstyle body
longDescription: A half-decomposed body is lying in the corner here.
description: YUK! It's ugly, disgusting ... it smells ... it also moves a bit!

name: oldstyle air elemental ruler
longDescription: The Ruler of the air elementals.
description: As you peer at him you seem to be looking at the sky itself.

name: oldstyle cancer
longDescription: Cancer the crab is here, hoarding the treasure away from you.
description:
You see a gigantic crab (YES, it is bigger than you!) with a crushed shell.
Legend is that he was crushed by Hercules when he was sent by Hera to kill him.
So Hera made Cancer a constellation for his work.

name: oldstyle leo
longDescription: Leo the lion is roaring at you, ready for a strike!
description:
His metallic skin means that he could be the one which was killed by Hercules
during his first Labour.  His skin is so weapon-proof that Hercules had to use
his bare hands to tear the lion into two from its mouth!

name: oldstyle lightning elemental ruler
longDescription: The Ruler of the lightning elementals.
description:
As you examine him there is a blinding flash of light and a deafening boom!
You rub your eyes and look and the ruler is there grinning at you.

name: oldstyle virgo
longDescription: Virgo is sitting here, winking at you suggestively ... you are alarmed!
description:
From what you have seen, you now realize that legends are legends, and Virgo
may not be the maid of chastity and purity at all!  But still she looks
gorgeous and is waiting for your first move, whatever it is ...

name: oldstyle water elemental ruler
longDescription: The Ruler of the water elementals.
description:
As you look at him he changes to mist, which swirls around you.  Just
as you get scared, it reforms in elemental form.

name: oldstyle libra
longDescription: Libra, the fair and just, is staring at you, weighing up the sins of your past.
description:
He is a wise old man and can see people's thoughts through their eyes....
Now all he can see from you is greed and bloodshed.

name: oldstyle water puddle elemental
longDescription: A small puddle of water elemental.
description: It trickles along the ground and gets your feet wet.

name: troll gang member
longDescription: A member of the Trolls wanders about here.
description: He's lived a life of violence ever since he was little.

name: oldstyle fido mutant dog
longDescription: The mutant beastly fido is here, his eyes glowing green!
description:
You see a mutant beastly fido, glaring at you with green eyes!  You wonder if
this factory meets ASPCA guidlines....

name: oldstyle fire flame elemental
longDescription: A small flickering flame elemental.
description: It smolders along the grass aimlessly.

name: oldstyle scorpio
longDescription: Scorpio is moving his tail towards you, waiting to put an end to some mortals.
description:
Ever since he killed Orion in the myths, he has been punished by having
Sagittarius' arrow aimed at his heart forever.

name: ogre gang member
longDescription: A member of the Ogres wanders about here.
description: He wants to rid the world of every last Troll gang member.

name: oldstyle foreman floyd
longDescription: Foreman Floyd is here, making plans for the factory's future.
description:
You see Foreman Floyd of the Mob factory -- a sterling example of what comes
of dedicated Mudding!  Rewarded for his years of dedication as a monster
slayer, Floyd now creates the beasts for other adventurers to fight.

name: oldstyle snowflake snow flake ice elemental
longDescription: A frozen snowflake water elemental.
description: It looks a little blue.

name: oldstyle sagittarius
longDescription: Sagittarius the centaur is waiting to let go of his well aimed arrow ...
description: He is a centaur and a well trained archer. No one can escape his arrows.

name: gang leader troll
longDescription: The gang leader is not pleased you found his hideout!
description:
He's risen to be leader through brute force and cunning leadership, you'd
guess mostly brute force from the size of his muscles.

name: oldstyle cityguard guard head
longDescription: The Cityguard head floats around aimlessly.
description:
You see a Cityguard head floating around without a care in the world.
Obviously, this one got past quality control!  Careful, those teeth look
sharp...

name: oldstyle pebble rock earth stone elemental
longDescription: A small rock.
description: It seems to be a small living pebble!

name: oldstyle capricorn
longDescription: Capricorn is here, feeling bored ... he wants a fight!
description:
You see a mean-looking ram here.  He used to be a fierce fighter in the ancient
war but now the gods have decided to put him here, to live out the rest of his
days in peace.

name: bruiser troll
longDescription: A big, mean bruiser is looking for limbs to break.
description: He's 6'6" 245 pounds and enough muscle to bash your head in. How like a Troll.

name: oldstyle revolving drunk
longDescription: The Revolving drunk is here, spinning in place.
description:
You see and smell a drunk who looks much like other drunks...but he is spinning
in place!  Someone should tell him that he is a REVOLTING drunk.

name: oldstyle aquarius
longDescription: The beautiful Aquarius is standing here, holding THE vessel.
description:
The pretty Water Bearer is smiling at you, you think you'd better give her a
hand with holding the vessel.

name: oldstyle spark lightning energy elemental
longDescription: A small spark of electricity fizzles here.
description: Zipping from place to place at the speed of light is tough work.

name: gang doll
longDescription: A gang doll looks naughty and nice.
description: She's a beauty (ok in RELATIVE terms) but you better not touch!

name: oldstyle child gnome
longDescription: A gnome child is playing around here.
description:
The little tyke looks so innocent playing with his boomerang that you
just want to pick him up and hug him.

name: oldstyle toxic slime
longDescription: A pool of toxic slime lies on  the floor.
description:
Yick.  Looks like someone had digestion problems!  Either that, or the
hydraulic fluid is leaking again.

name: oldstyle pisces mermaid
longDescription: Pisces the mermaid is sitting here, waiting for your help.
description:
She has been forced to serve her husband, who had been cursed to turn into a
fish and she deserves your pity.

name: oldstyle acid blob elemental
longDescription: A small blob of acid aimlessly eats away at the stone.
description: The magical blob of acid is a cross between lightning and water.

name: patrolman patrol man
longDescription: A patrolman is trying to keep the peace.
description: He'd rather be at the local pub then out here with these nasty kids.

name: oldstyle woman gnome
longDescription: A gnome woman is standing here, trying to look beautiful.
description:
The woman is short and gnarled, but acts like a woman several times her beauty.
She's starting to look pretty attractive to you ...

name: oldstyle worker
longDescription: A Mob Factory worker is standing here, looking bored.
description:
The worker wears a bright orange pair of overalls, with the words "Mob
Factory" written in a bright purple starburst.  Fashion plate, he's not.

name: oldstyle pisces fish
longDescription: Pisces the fish, is jealous of your approach...
description:
He was once a very handsome man but now has turned into an ugly big fish.
So he becomes jealous of any living thing which is more handsome than him.

name: oldstyle lava elemental
longDescription: A lava beast spews from place to place.
description: The magical lava beast is a cross between fire and earth.

name: vandal ogre
longDescription: A vandal is spray painting pro-gang slogans on the wall here.
description: He has a wary eye and a fine hand for art.

name: oldstyle man gnome
longDescription: A gnome man is walking here, on his way to work.
description:
This is a prime example of a gnome.  He looks short and weak, but at the
same time an intelligent creature who could outsmart you.

name: oldstyle worker
longDescription: A Mob Factory worker is here, asleep in a chair.
description:
If Floyd walks in, you can bet there'll be trouble.  Guess she shouldn't have
worked the late shift!

name: oldstyle bear ursa major
longDescription: Ursa Major the bear is the last defense against any intruders.
description:
The Huge Bear which resides in the northern skies is here.
You think you'd better turn back.  At least you have got a chance of survival.

name: oldstyle mud elemental
longDescription: A mud monster slops around.
description: The magical mud monster is a cross between water and earth.

name: dog pit bull pitbull
longDescription: A vicious pitbull is foaming at the mouth in rabid anticipation.
description:
You get a nice close look at him while he's tearing at your throat.
His fangs are blood-stained from hearty meals of ... steak?!

name: oldstyle scientist gnome
longDescription: A scientist wanders around deep in thought.
description:
You see a gnome who is lost deep into some invention that he is about
to make.  His hair is white, but he looks fairly strong.

name: oldstyle cassiopeia queen
longDescription: Cassiopeia, the queen of the Universe, is sitting on her throne.
description: She is the Queen of Dignity; facing her you feel all your dignity has gone.

name: oldstyle mist elemental
longDescription: The air is magically misty here.
description: The magical mist is a cross between water and air.

name: punk troll
longDescription: A punk is here, carving his initials into a wall.
description: He's a sterling example of rehabilitation at work.  Not nice.

name: oldstyle guard gnome
longDescription: A gnome guard stands here guarding something.
description:
This is a well trained gnome.  He might not have a lot of strength but
he makes up for it with his weapons skill.

name: oldstyle particle elemental
longDescription: A sub-atomic particle is too small for you to see.
description: The magical manifestation of energy.

name: oldstyle cepheus king
longDescription: Cepheus, the king of the Universe, is sitting on his throne.
description:
He is the King of Might as well as of the Universe. You suddenly feel very
weak and useless in front of him.

name: gang leader ogre
longDescription: The Ogre gang leader snaps out his stiletto. "Care to dance?"
description: He's smaller, but undoubtably smarter, than the Troll's leader.

name: oldstyle chief gnome
longDescription: A powerful looking gnome stands here wearing ornate clothes.
description:
The Chief looks like he could whap you hard.  He looks not only powerful
but wise and resourceful.  You better not mess with him.

name: oldstyle dust elemental
longDescription: A dust cloud blowing by makes you sneeze.
description: The magical dust cloud is a cross between air and earth.

name: oldstyle polaris polar star
longDescription: Polaris, the polar star, who commands the whole Universe, stands before you!
description:
He is the Master of the Universe, (NOT He-Man!), the most powerful!
Even the King and the Queen obey him.  As you look at him you notice he is
actually a STAR, with dazzling bright light ... maybe you shouldn't have come
here at all?

name: thug
longDescription: An ugly, scarred thug is here, looking for dogs to kick.
description:
The thug isn't quite as big as the Troll's bruisers, but you can tell he loves
breaking heads for the Ogres.

name: oldstyle troll small
longDescription: A small troll grunts as he takes a swing at you.
description:
The small troll is a short and stocky beast with a human-like face
but with the eyes and fangs of a wild beast.

name: oldstyle eddie elemental
longDescription: A small eddie current swirls junk around here.
description: The magical eddie current is a manifestation of an air elemental.

name: oldstyle mouse field
longDescription: A small mouse runs across your foot.
description: The Mouse is a cute little creature.

name: oldstyle blue flame
longDescription: The Blue Flame burns mysteriously here.
description:
As you look you see what seems to be a face and almost a
humanoid figure somehow trapped in the fire.

name: oldstyle rat
longDescription: A small rat shrieks and runs around.
description: The rat is a little evil creature that deserves death.

name: oldstyle magneto
longDescription: The Magneto considers zapping you for the heck of it.
description: A humanoid figure seems to be trapped in the field of the Magneto.

name: oldstyle rat large
longDescription: A large rat runs up to you and nibbles on your boots.
description: You have the urge to kill this vile creature.

name: oldstyle ice bandit
longDescription: The Ice Bandit strikes cold fear in your heart.
description: A humanoid figure encased in ice but still apparently alive.

name: oldstyle rat giant
longDescription: A giant rat growls at you and prepares to attack.
description: This rat has grown up to be the size of an average dog.

name: oldstyle rock monster
longDescription: The Rock Monster considers you in stoney silence.
description: A humanoid figure trapped in stone seems alive.

name: oldstyle troll
longDescription: A giant troll lumbers around.
description:
You see before you a huge mass of living flesh.  You cringe in fear as
he lifts his powerful arm to bludgeon you.

name: oldstyle hurricane
longDescription: A Hurricane rages across the sky.
description: A humanoid figure is trapped in the rushing wind.

name: oldstyle astral guardian
longDescription: A grey figure guards the entrance to the astral plane.
description:
You see a slate grey vaguely humanoid shape, devoid of any true features.
It stands before you with arms folded, seemingly uninterested in you.

name: oldstyle bat black
longDescription: A black bat hangs from the ceiling.
description: The bat is a grotesque little creature with large wings and fangs.

name: oldstyle magician
longDescription: An elemental magician seeks magical stones for a spell.
description:
The elemental magician has come here in search of the fabled
Stone of Surrender which can be used to render opponents senseless.

name: oldstyle nightmare
longDescription: A nightmare is here, kicking at you with its flaming hooves.
description:
The nightmare is a wholly evil being, sent out by the rulers of the lower
planes to torment mortals.  It vaguely resembles a horse, with a hide blacker
than the darkest night, and hooves that burn with unholy fires.

name: oldstyle zombie gnome
longDescription: A zombie gnome shuffles his way towards you.
description:
This is a creature which has passed away long ago.  His body has been
pulled out of its resting place by some evil force.

name: oldstyle rainbow warrior
longDescription: A warrior of the Rainbow Cult swears his loyalty.
description:
The Rainbow Cult has received special powers for their service to
the elemental forces.

name: oldstyle night hag
longDescription: A night hag reaches out to steal your soul.
description:
You see a shadowy creature with long talons and an evil grin, whose sole
purpose is to hunt down and slay mortals in order to obtain souls for her foul
master to torment.

name: oldstyle bat fire
longDescription: The fire bat flames brightly and prepares to attack.
description:
You see a huge flame which resembles the shape of a bat.  The creature
hangs from the ceiling and bites at you.

name: oldstyle illusionist
longDescription: The illusionist seeks the aid of the elemental forces.
description:
He seeks their aid for a powerful new spell of deception.

<wielded>            The Sword of Illusions

name: oldstyle stalker invisible
longDescription: You see a wavy distortion in the air.
description:
You see only a wavy distortion in the air.  You reach out to touch it, and
feel nothing, not even the slightest of motions.

name: oldstyle guard hobgoblin
longDescription: The hobgoblin guard attacks first, thinks later.
description:
This is an extra large, extra ugly goblin like creature.  He grins evilly
as he attempts to brain you.

name: oldstyle alchemist
longDescription: An alchemist wanders by in search of magical herbs.
description: Rare herbs are rumored to grow only in the canyon.

name: oldstyle soulless one
longDescription: The soulless one wanders mindlessly.
description:
This unfortunate being has had its very soul torn from its body.  It now roams
mindlessly, unaware of its surroundings.

name: oldstyle soldier hobgoblin
longDescription: A hobgoblin soldier stands here.
description:
This is just a low life hobgoblin, who couldn't make it to the ranks
of the elite guards.  He looks pissed.

name: oldstyle baby rainbow dragon
longDescription: A baby rainbow dragon plays among the elements here.
description: It's only a baby by dragon standards.

name: oldstyle githyanki hunter
longDescription: A githyanki hunter searches for signs of the githzerai.
description:
You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands almost as tall as a
normal man.  Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow
and sunken.

name: oldstyle bodyguard hobgoblin
longDescription: A hobgoblin bodyguard guards the king with his life.
description:
This is one of the elite hobgoblin guards.  He stands tall for his short
stature.  He grins a toothy grin as he prepares to attack.

name: oldstyle imp
longDescription: A little imp runs along being annoying.
description: The little bugger steals stuff and is generally obnoxious.

name: oldstyle githyanki warrior
longDescription: You see a humanoid figure clad in splinted armor.
description:
You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands as tall as a normal
man.  Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and sunken.
He is clad in ornately designed splinted armor, and wields a sword that
whistles through the air as it slices towards your neck.

name: oldstyle king hobgoblin
longDescription: There is a great king here, sitting in his throne.
description:
The king is a silly looking hobgoblin whose muscles bulge out of his robes,
destroying the sophisticated effect he was trying to create.

name: oldstyle HUGE elemental
longDescription: A HUGE elemental form stands here.
description: HUGE, need i say more?

name: oldstyle githyanki guardian
longDescription: A humanoid figure clad in splinted armor blocks your way.
description:
You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands as tall as a normal
man.  Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and sunken.
He is clad in ornately designed splinted armor, and wields a sword that
whistles through the air as it slices towards your neck.

name: oldstyle miner hobgoblin
longDescription: A hobgoblin miner stands here looking for gold.
description: The miner is totally covered in dust.

name: oldstyle vendor
longDescription: A vendor is willing to sell you elixirs.
description: I WOULD NOT suggest you attack me ...!

name: oldstyle treasurer hobgoblin
longDescription: A treasurer is here counting out money.
description:
The hobgoblin treasurer is an old goblin with glasses.  It appears that he
can only see a couple feet in front of him.

name: oldstyle githyanki knight
longDescription: A tall figure armored in black observes you quietly.
description:
You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands a full foot taller
than a normal man.  His features are obscured by a suit of ornately designed
splinted armor -- you only hear the hissing of his breath and the scraping
of his sword against its scabbard as it is unsheathed.

name: oldstyle prisoner gnome
longDescription: A gnome prisoner is here resting in the straw.
description: The prisoner is just barely alive.

name: oldstyle githyanki protector
longDescription: A black knight of the githyanki protects his queen.
description:
You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands a full foot taller
than a normal man.  His features are obscured by a suit of ornately designed
splinted armor -- you only hear the hissing of his breath and the scraping
of his sword against its scabbard as it is unsheathed.

name: oldstyle githyanki gish
longDescription: A small githyanki laughs at you through fanged teeth.
description:
You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands nearly as tall as a
normal man.  Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and
sunken.  The gish are well-versed in the arcane arts, unlike the normal gith
people.  You notice this from the blast of lightning headed towards you.

name: oldstyle prisoner human
longDescription: A human prisoner is here resting in the straw.
description: The prisoner is just barely alive.

name: oldstyle githyanki gish
longDescription: A gish laughs as flame leaps from his hands towards your face.
description:
You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands nearly as tall as a
normal man.  Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and
sunken.  The gish are well-versed in the arcane arts, unlike the normal gith
people.  You notice this from the blast of lightning headed towards you.

name: oldstyle hermit crab
longDescription: A hermit crab crawls towards you.
description:
The hermit crab is about 5 feet high and looks mad that you had the nerve
to wake it up.

name: oldstyle githyanki warlock
longDescription: A humanoid figure stands here, holding a silvery sword.
description:
You see a leathery-skinned creature, clad all in black and bearing a silvery-
colored sword.  Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow
and sunken.  As you turn to flee, you feel the impact of a fireball against
your back.

name: oldstyle cook hobgoblin
longDescription: A hobgoblin cook stands here cooking something.
description:
The cook is a dirty and fat hobgoblin.  He burps as he stirs up something
in a pot.

name: oldstyle githyanki lich queen
longDescription: The evil lich-queen of the Gith reaches out to destroy you.
description:
The lich-queen of the githyanki was once human, but no longer.  Her skin has
completely shrunken around her skull, held together solely by the force of
unholy magic and the powers of this plane of existence.  The cold glare of her
hollow eyes sends you into paroxysms of fright.

name: oldstyle lord gith
longDescription:
Lord Gith suddenly forms from a cloud of blackness.
He stares right through you with deadly, cold eyes.
description:
Lord Gith is the dead savior of the githyanki people, the warrior who led them
to freedom from their former enslavers, the mind flayers.  He has been dead
for centuries and stands before you now due to an unholy alliance with powers
beyond mortal ken.

He gestures towards you.  You feel your heart tremble and your throat begin
to tighten.  You are about to die.

name: oldstyle ghost
longDescription: A ghost wanders here, intent on destroying all life.
description:
The ghost makes no sound.  It is a shadowy shell of its former self, cursed
now to roam forever without rest.  The mind of this creature has been twisted
and destroyed in this torment, and it now envys and intends to destroy all the
true living beings it encounters, including you.

name: oldstyle githzerai prisoner
longDescription: A githzerai plots his escape plan.
description:
You see a conniving humanoid, a descendant of a race of humans once enslaved
by the mindflayers and related to the githyanki.  Unfortunately, the two races
are bitter enemies, and this one happened to get caught.  He intends to escape.

name: oldstyle mindflayer prisoner
longDescription: A mindflayer lies here, scarred from the torture inflicted by the Gith.
description:
You see a formerly tall humanoid creature, with four tentacles hanging from the
middle of its head.  It is hunched over, bent and scarred from torture inflicted
by the githyanki.  It cringes as you approach.

name: oldstyle dragon red slave
longDescription: A giant red dragon is chained here, his breath heating the furnace.
description:
The mighty scaled beast has been magically bound and subdued by the residents
of the keep.  Nevertheless, he is still an impressive sight, some twenty feet
in length with an even more massive wingspan.  He watches you, smoke drifting
from his open mouth.

name: oldstyle fire furnace flame
longDescription: The fires of the furnace burn away at your skin!
description: The fire feeds on your skin like a living being, licking out at your hair.

name: tridrone
longDescription: A tridrone is here doing a menial task.
description: You see what appears to be a 3 sided pyramid with spidery arms and legs.

name: quadrone
longDescription: A quadrone is here watching for trespassers.
description: A cubic creature, with spiny arms and legs.

name: pentadrone
longDescription: The pentadrone is here policing the area.
description: A five-armed creature which resembles a starfish on thin stilt-like legs.

name: decaton
longDescription: A decaton is here overseeing the other modrons.
description: The decaton is a large, ten-tentacled sphere on stumpy legs.

name: nonaton
longDescription: A nonaton is here preserving law and order.
description: A cylidrical modron with 9 tentacles and stubby legs.

name: octon
longDescription: An octon is here governing his ward of responsilbility.
description:
The octon has a collar at shoulder level with 8 tentacled arms growing out of
it.

name: septon
longDescription: A septon is here preserving order.
description:
The septon appears as a human with a large bald head. It has a shoulder collar
with 7 tentacles coming from it.

name: hexton
longDescription: A hexton is here watching over his armies.
description:
A hexton appears as a humanoid with 6 arms: 2 large human arms with 6 fingers,
and 4 tentacles below tipped with sharp claws.

name: quinton
longDescription: A quinton is here keeping records.
description:
Quintons look like tall, stocky humanoids with 4 flexible arms jutting from the
shoulders.  A prehensile tail serves as the creature's 5th arm, and they have
fan-like wings attached to their shoulders.

name: tertian
longDescription: A tertian is here administering the law.
description:
Tertians look very human, save for their 12 foot size, the horns jutting from
the sides of their bald heads, and the long prehensile tail ending in a mace-
like ball.

name: secundus
longDescription: A Secundus, one of the Viceroys of Nirvana, is here.
description:
The secundi is an incredibly thin, tall humanoids with long, narrow faces
and deepset eyes. It radiates intense power.

name: Primus
longDescription: Primus, ruler of the Plane of Nirvana, forms out of an energy pool.
description:
Primus is a huge being who rises out of the energy pool and glares at you with
violet eyes. His right hand is wreathed in darkness, his left in light, and
he looks very displeased to see you.

name: oldstyle grand knight paladin
longDescription: The Grand Knight is standing here, waiting for someone to help.
description:
The Knight is standing here, smiling at you. He is dressed all in
white, blue and silver. He looks VERY strong, as he stands here, ready to
help the innocent.

name: oldstyle knight ethereal dark
longDescription: A dark ethereal knight hovers over the bloody clearing.
description:
The ethereal knight is clad in shadowy black armor. It appears as though he
was involved in the carnage that occurred here. His soul is trapped here, as
he waits for release.

name: oldstyle treant tree
longDescription: A huge, gnarled tree stands here, battered by age and nature.
description:
The old tree looks as though the wind has battered and torn at it for years.
Very few leaves remain. Its limbs are crooked and gnarled. It moans as the
wind pushes it back and forth.

name: oldstyle baby beholder
longDescription: You meet a baby beholder's cute gaze!
description:
It has a large central eye that blinks like a guppy and eyestalks atop the
round body which can charm you with its cuteness.  Baby beholders are known for
their playful personality.  Hmmm....  It looks like the baby is teething!

name: oldstyle dweller cave creature
longDescription: A slimy, gross creature is here munching on a corpse.
description:
The cave dweller looks like a mixture of several disgusting monsters. It has
a bird's beak, huge white eyes, a furry body, and long clawed hands and feet.
It sees you and snarls.

name: oldstyle lamia pet
longDescription: A pet lamia stands here waiting for her next command.
description:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.

name: oldstyle toad rock
longDescription: A rather large rock toad sits here, croaking loudly.
description: A grey toad. Its about the size of a cow. Small horns grow all over its body.

name: oldstyle citizen man
longDescription: A citizen of Thalos is here, conversing with everyone.
description:
He smiles at you, almost as if he knows you.  He is so friendly, you have no
choice but to reciprocate.

name: oldstyle weeping willow tree
longDescription: A large willow tree stands here, weeping.
description:
The weeping willow has long thins branches. These branches seem to droop in
anguish and dismay. You hear a faint sound of crying.

name: oldstyle guard imperial cityguard
longDescription: An imperial cityguard is here, keeping the peace of Thalos.
description:
He is dressed in plate, and he looks quite formidable.  At the moment, though,
he is just giggling with a kid running about.

name: oldstyle mist mistling
longDescription: A mistling emerges from the mist surrounding you.
description: It looks like a thin wisp of mist that has gained substance and size.

name: oldstyle citizen woman female
longDescription: A female citizen of Thalos is here, showing off her new dress.
description:
She is beautiful, dressed in a sundress that sparkles with gems sown in.  She
smiles at you, and your heart flutters at the thought that you have her
attention, if only for a moment.

name: oldstyle swamp wraith
longDescription: A swamp wraith emerges from the mist here.
description:
The swamp wraith is made of mist and is in the image of a great warrior. He
appears to emerge from the mist. You feel the cold radiating from his form as
he nears you.

name: oldstyle gordon defender
longDescription:
Gordon the Brave, the Defender of Thalos, is here, looking at no
one but you, the only stranger in town.
description:
Gordon is dressed in full mithril plate, and he looks indestructible.  He eyes
you suspiciously not only because you are a stranger, but because you are an
ARMED stranger.  Better not do any funny stuff in his presence.

name: oldstyle ogre villager
longDescription: The ogre villager is here, going about its chores.
description:
You see a pitifully overworked ogre. It is dressed in rags and shuffles along
with its head hung low. It sees you and cringes in mortal terror.

name: oldstyle druid Aruncus
longDescription: Aruncus the Druid is walking around here, searching for herbs.
description:
Aruncus is a tall, skinny druid with a face marked by nature.
He seems to be in peace with himself and his surroundings.

name: oldstyle priest
longDescription: A fanatic priest is here, foretelling the destruction of Thalos.
description:
The priest must have lost his mind.  He keeps saying that one day, evil will
prevail and take over Thalos and bring the whole city down.  Obviously, no one
