listens to this fool.  The priest's right fist is covered in golden silk,
and he clenches it at you.  Other than that, he is dressed all in black.

name: oldstyle warrior ogre
longDescription: The ogre warrior stands here, growling fiercely.
description:
The ogre warrior is dressed in thick fur armor. He looks quite large and
formidable.

name: oldstyle hermit sorbus
longDescription: Sorbus the Hermit is sitting here, roasting a rabbit.
description:
Sorbus bares the marks of a long, hard life in solitude.
He is dressed in simple clothing and looks like he has little
or nothing to say.

name: oldstyle priest
longDescription: The priest of Thalos tells you of the glories of this city.
description:
He stands here gloriously telling of Thalos's history, how it is now referred by
the world as 'The City of Peace'.  He is very happy to be the high priest here.

name: oldstyle guard ogre
longDescription: The ogre guard is here manning his post faithfully.
description:
The ogre guard stands here manning his post. It appears as though he would
fight to the death before abandoning his post.

name: oldstyle golem stone
longDescription: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
description:
It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant
stone creature.  It stands here guarding the city.

name: oldstyle citizen
longDescription: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you ... stranger!
description:
He seems like a nice person with no interest in harming you or others.
He wears normal, light clothing and has an anonymous face.

name: oldstyle shaman ogre
longDescription: The ogre shaman is here chanting arcane words and waving his arms.
description:
The ogre shaman is draped in thick fur cloaks and pelts. He has all types of
charms and holy symbols draped about him. He looks at you and snarls.

name: oldstyle mayor
longDescription: The mayor of Thalos is sitting here, doing his paperwork.
description:
He looks very busy, but he takes the time to say, 'Hi!  Welcome to Thalos!'
He looks very proud of his work.

name: oldstyle citizen
longDescription: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you ... stranger!
description:
She seems like a nice person with no interest in harming you or others.
She wears a minimum of clothing and has big ... eyes.

name: oldstyle chief chieftain ogre
longDescription: The ogre chieftain is here, observing his subjects.
description:
This is the biggest ogre you have ever seen. He is heavily equipped and looks
quite formidable. He towers high above you and growls menacingly.

name: oldstyle dan barkeep
longDescription: Dan the Barkeep stands by the counter wiping a glass.
description: He looks at you, and says, 'What's your poison, stranger?'

name: oldstyle worm Shudde-M'ell
longDescription: Shudde-M'ell the Giant worm of G'harne is guarding his treasure.
description:
Shudde-M'ell is about 15 ft long and is surrounded by an evil stench,
The worm is the protector of the treasure of G'harne and has been so
for as long anyone can remember.

name: oldstyle barbarian
longDescription: A plains barbarian is here, clad in heavy furs.
description:
The plains barbarian is clad in heavy furs. He seems used to the chilling cold
and icy wastes.

name: oldstyle george butcher
longDescription: George the Butcher is here whacking away at a side of beef.
description:
Looking down at you with blood splattered all over his face and apron,
he asks, 'How much you want?'

name: oldstyle luxan shopkeeper
longDescription: Luxan the Shopkeeper is here, eager to sell you anything.
description:
Luxan is dressed in a strange jacket.
He looks like a mean trader from the outskirts of Midgaard.
His life is seems to be totally occupied with trading.
He looks very fit and capable of protecting his goods.

name: oldstyle yeti white
longDescription: The white yeti crouches here snarling.
description:
The white yeti looks like a huge white snow ape. Its long arms end in long
curved talons and its mouth is full of sharp teeth.

name: oldstyle farmer betty
longDescription: Farmer Betty looks at you sweetly offering you some apples.
description: She smiles at you meekly.

name: oldstyle keeper innkeeper
longDescription: An Innkeeper is here waiting for your order.
description:
The Innkeeper looks skilled in brewing different beers and mixing the
wierdest drinks known. He also looks very big.

name: oldstyle worm ice iceworm
longDescription:
A huge ice worm burrows through the ice and snow here. It rears up and
attacks!
description:
The huge worm is almost 50 feet long. Its huge gaping mouth spews ice and snow
as it charges directly at you.

name: oldstyle thaellor dwarf
longDescription: Thaellor is here selling his metal wares.
description:
Thaellor sweats rivers and complains about the heat as he pounds the
metal into items of defense and destruction.

name: oldstyle rabbit
longDescription: A cute rabbit is here.
description: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.

name: oldstyle citizen minotaur
longDescription: A minotaur citizen is here, hurrying through the icy streets.
description:
You see a rather ragged and cold minotaur. It appears to be looking for a warm
place to seek refuge from the cold.

name: oldstyle ben smith
longDescription: Ben the Smith sells metal odds and ends to anyone interested.
description: Ben tries to pawn his various wares to you.

name: oldstyle dragon pet
longDescription: Ravan's pet dragon is bouncing around here flapping her cute wings.
description:
Ravan's pet dragon is about 3 ft. tall with small pointy teeth.
The small wings are eagerly trying to lift her from the ground,
but so far they haven't succeeded.

name: oldstyle guard minotaur
longDescription: A minotaur guard catches you trespassing and attacks!
description:
The minotaur is clad in heavy furs. Beneath these furs, you see the gleam of
his armor.

name: oldstyle librarian
longDescription: The librarian is here shelving books away neatly.
description: The librarian looks busy and whispers, 'Shhh!'

name: oldstyle warrior minotaur
longDescription: A minotaur warrior is here looking for intruders.
description:
You see a huge minotaur that is dressed in thick furs and armor. He has black
fur and red eyes. He looks quite capable of protecting the city.

name: oldstyle scholar boy
longDescription: A young scholar studies quietly in the corner.
description: This young scholar is studying to be a priest.

name: oldstyle minotaur gatekeeper
longDescription: A minotaur is here guarding the Keep of Mahn-Tor.
description:
The minotaur stands rigidly before the gates of the keep. It looks quite
miserable standing in the driven snow and ice.

name: oldstyle wizard
longDescription: An old wizard sits quietly at the counter waiting for a sale.
description: This old wizard almost looks like he is about to fall over and sleep.

name: oldstyle minotaur high guard
longDescription: The minotaur high guard is here guarding the Keep.
description:
The high guard is dressed in blue plate armour. He looks quite dangerous and
skilled.

name: oldstyle masseuse woman
longDescription: A beautiful woman is here offering you a massage.
description:
She is beautiful, dressed in a sundress that sparkles with gems sown in.  She
smiles at you, and your heart flutters at the thought that you have her
attention, and you jump to her offer for a massage.

name: oldstyle minotaur royal guard
longDescription: The royal minotaur guard considers you an intruder and attacks!
description:
The royal guard is quite huge. He is dressed in heavy red armor and wields a
huge glaive. He looks quite capable of protecting the keep.

name: oldstyle bather man
longDescription: A man is here bathing.
description:
He smiles at you, almost as if he knows you.  He is so friendly, you have no
choice but to reciprocate and join him and the others in the soothing pool.

name: oldstyle guard minotaur elite
longDescription: The elite minotaur guard sees you and attacks!
description:
This minotaur wields a huge morningstar and is clad in heavy crimson plate and
furs.

name: oldstyle guard imperial cityguard
longDescription: An imperial cityguard overseeing patrols in the city.
description:
He is dressed in plate, and he looks quite formidable.  At the moment,
he is looking at a map of Thalos aside his fellow co-workers keeping
track of each city patrol.

name: oldstyle girl haremgirl harem slave
longDescription: A harem girl cowers here in fear.
description:
She looks quite attractive. Her low cut gown reveals why she was chosen to be
in the harem.

name: oldstyle guard cityguard
longDescription: An imperial cityguard guards the Grand Gate.
description:
He is dressed in plate, and he looks quite formidable.  At the moment,
he is watching the children play with amusement.

name: oldstyle butler minotaur
longDescription: A minotaur butler stands here rigidly, awaiting orders.
description: He looks quite regal and refined to be a minotaur.

name: oldstyle doe
longDescription: A doe munches on grass.
description:
This peaceful creature looks at you with big dark eyes.  Her nose twitches as
she sniffs at you, but she goes back to chewing some grass.

name: oldstyle keeper minotaur ring-keeper
longDescription: The minotaur ring-keeper stands guarding his post.
description:
The ring-keeper is a huge minotaur. You notice a huge ring of multicolored
keys hanging from his belt. He wears huge, spiked brass knuckles.

name: oldstyle deer
longDescription: A deer stares back at you.
description:
The deer looks angered at your intrusion.  He butts his head against you,
albeit ineffectively.

name: oldstyle gorak minotaur warrior master
longDescription: Gorak, the Minotaur Master Warrior, is here practicing his skills.
description:
Gorak is HUGE. His bulging muscles are confined beneath heavy armor. He is the
master of the warrior guild of Mahn-Tor.

name: oldstyle stag deer
longDescription: A large deer stag protects his territory.
description: He eyes you with contained anger.  You'd better leave him alone!

name: oldstyle darkoth minotaur anti-paladin master
longDescription: Darkoth, the minotaur anti-paladin, stands here grinning wickedly.
description:
Darkoth is a living incarnation of evil. He radiates a dark aura, and a cold
chill runs down your spine. He is the master of the Mahn-Tor anti-paladins.

name: oldstyle bunny rabbit
longDescription: A small bunny pokes from bush to bush.
description: This bunny looks so adorable, you wished you had one just like this!

name: oldstyle tyrgoth minotaur paladin master
longDescription: Tyrgoth, the minotaur paladin, is here worshipping silently.
description:
Tyrgoth is the minotaur incarnation of good. You feel safe and at ease in his
presence. He is the leader of the Mahn-Tor paladins.

name: oldstyle snake
longDescription: A small snake slithers between the grass.
description: Upon careful inspection, you are sure it is NOT a cobra!

name: oldstyle amyrok minotaur mage master
longDescription: Amyrok, the minotaur archmage, is here chanting arcane spells.
description:
Amyrok is a small minotaur. He is clad in loose robes and emits an aura of
power. He appears quite dangerous, despite his size. He is the leader of the
mages of Mahn-Tor.

name: oldstyle druid
longDescription: A druid is here in meditation.
description: He doesn't like you bothering him, but is too polite to ask you to leave.

name: oldstyle sumaron minotaur cleric master
longDescription: Sumaron, master cleric of Mahn-Tor, is here looking holy.
description:
Sumaron is clad in white glowing robes. He is goodness incarnate. He is the
master of all the clerics of Mahn-Tor.

name: oldstyle druidess
longDescription: A druidess peers at you.
description: She wonders why you are staring at her, and how you got in here.

name: oldstyle nasturn minotaur druid master
longDescription: Nasturn, the minotaur druid, is here studying the arts of nature.
description:
Nasturn is quite a natural looking minotaur. He is dressed in leather and
wears no metal of any type. He looks at you and smiles.

name: oldstyle musician bard
longDescription: A bard sings of the glory of Thalos.
description: This musical fellow plays a happy song with his fellow comrades.

name: oldstyle belrak minotaur ranger master
longDescription: Belrak, the minotaur ranger, looks unhappy about having visitors.
description:
Belrak is clad in green and brown leather. He looks quite agile and thin, when
compared to the normal minotaur. He looks at you with a slight smirk.

name: oldstyle musician bard
longDescription: This bard merrily skips along singing of the glory of Thalos.
description: This musical fellow wanders the world singing of the glory of Thalos.

name: oldstyle dorgar minotaur thief master
longDescription: Dorgar, the minotaur thief, is here hiding in the shadows.
description:
Dorgar is clad all in black. He is tall and slender, unlike most minotaurs. He
appears to be quite a skilled thief.

name: oldstyle cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard stands here.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: oldstyle mahn-tor minotaur grand master
longDescription: Mahn-Tor, the minotaur grand master, is here looking down at you.
description:
Mahn-Tor towers above you. He is simply huge. Mahn-Tor is clad in the best of
armor and robes. He wields the largest axe you have ever seen. You can see why
Mahn-Tor is the leader of the minotaurs. He is awe-inspiring.

name: oldstyle janitor
longDescription: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.

name: oldstyle fido dog
longDescription: Beastly Fido is here.
description:
Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging
around his teeth.

name: oldstyle cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: python snake
longDescription: The huge python rears its head and hisses at you.
description: It sways back and forth contemplating whether or not to eat you.

name: garter snake
longDescription: A small green garter snake slithers along the floor.
description: It looks harmless enough.  Or is it?

name: centipede
longDescription: A small centipede here is looking for vegetation.
description: It looks completely harmless but who knows for sure?

name: kobold
longDescription: An ugly kobold mumbles something under its breath.
description: It looks ugly enough to scare its own mother.

name: orc
longDescription: This orc is frothing around the mouth.  Better stay away.
description: You notice a slight tinge of madness in his eyes.

name: orc
longDescription: This large orc is looking for someone small to pick on.
description: The orc says, "Whatcha look'n at?"

name: acolyte cleric
longDescription: An acolyte of Zump welcomes you to mud school.
description: He's big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

name: warrior
longDescription: This tall warrior has more scars than even you!
description: He's surely a strong, brainless fighter.  Like you.

name: blob
longDescription: The blob is here, waiting to eat you up.
description:
He is big, he is bad.  You don't want to fight him when he isn't chained up.
Perhaps now would be a good time to flee from him!!!  If you don't flee, you
would really suffer the consequences.

name: warrior
longDescription: This veteran warrior is old enough to be your father.
description:
He seems to know his way with weapons.  And he wants
to show you what he can do!

name: oldstyle guardian beast
longDescription: A guardian beast stares at you and snarls in rage.
description:
Jet black fur covers this beast.  You stare at his two huge red eyes.  You can
count at least 50 teeth on this monster.  You can't tell whether it is blood or
saliva dripping from the beast's jaw.  The guardian beast snarls again.

name: monster
longDescription: There is a monster leashed here.
description:
He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since
he is leashed up, and you are not.

name: hobgoblin
longDescription: A small beat-up hobgoblin cringes in the corner.
description:
Looking into the eyes of this poor soul makes you feel
sad as you see the terror and fear in its eyes.  Why
don't you put it out of its misery?

name: oldstyle young troll
longDescription: A young troll is sitting down, chewing on a bone.
description:
He is a tall, wiry, furry humanoid.
Your eyes lock with his.  He smiles, puts down his bone, and reaches for one
of yours!!

name: monster wimpy
longDescription: There is a wimpy monster leashed here.
description:
He looks wimpy.  You feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since
he is leashed up, and you are not.

name: oldstyle medium troll
longDescription: A troll is grooming his pet, a guardian beast.
description:
He is a tall, lean, furry humanoid.
He is busy licking the ticks off of his beast.
His eyes dart toward you, as he realizes you are one third his size.

name: snake
longDescription: A sickly brown snake watches you with caution.
description: A closer look reveals a hungry demeanor.  Don't get too close!

name: monster aggressive
longDescription: There is an aggressive monster leashed here.
description:
He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since
he is leashed up, and you are not.

name: oldstyle baby troll
longDescription: A baby troll is playing Doctor with a cadaver.
description:
He is a large, chubby, furry humanoid.
He is trying to stuff an arm in a hole in the wall.
He notices you and gargles "WANNA JOIN?".

name: centipede
longDescription: A white centipede crawls along the cave floors randomly.
description: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.

name: oldstyle giant troll
longDescription: A giant troll is lying on a pile of carnage, pleasing his mistress.
description:
He is a gigantic, muscular, furry humanoid.
He gasps as he notices your intrusion.
You gasp as you realize you have intruded upon his acts of passion!

name: monster wimpy aggressive
longDescription: There is a wimpy aggressive monster leashed here.
description:
He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since
he is leashed up, and you are not.

name: hobgoblin
longDescription: A large hobgoblin is here wondering if he should tear you apart.
description:
Red, bloodshot eyes and drool dripping from its mouth makes you
wonder just how far away you should be.

name: oldstyle large troll female
longDescription: A large female troll is lying on the pile of carnage, blissfully writhing.
description:
She is a huge, grotesque, furry humanoid.
She moans in passion but gasps as she notices you.
Her smiles turn into snarls as she screams at you!

name: orc
longDescription: An orc is here, looking for something (or perhaps someone) to eat.
description:
As you already know, orcs have quite a ravenous appetite.
Care to be dinner?

name: big creature
longDescription: There is a big creature hulking over your form.
description:
He looks mean, and you just might have a small problem killing him, but he
looks like a great prize!!!

name: oldstyle smurf
longDescription: A smurf is singing and walking along.
description:
A cute little blue smurf with a white hat and white boots.  You have a sudden
urge to crush him.

name: oldstyle fat worm
longDescription: A fat worm scurries around, looking for food.
description:
It is thick and long.  You can't find a head on this thing.
It moves quickly, from corpse to corpse.

name: adept cleric
longDescription: An adept of the mighty goddess Satin is here, contemplating your progress.
description: She is big and bad.  Don't mess with her.

name: lion mountain
longDescription: A mountain lion bears its teeth at the sight of more food.
description:
Huge claws and big teeth make quite a fearsome opponent for
the weary.  Are you next?

name: oldstyle smurf
longDescription: A smurf is here, picking berries.
description: A small smurf is quietly picking berries.  He seems to hardly notice you.

name: adept
longDescription: An adept of Alander is here, smiling at you.
description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

name: oldstyle roving beast
longDescription: A roving beast is searching for prey.
description:
Jet black fur covers this beast.
You stare at his two huge red eyes.  You can count at least 50 teeth on this
beast.  You can't tell whether it is blood or saliva dripping from the beast's
jaw.  The roving beast snarls at you.

name: giant hill
longDescription: A hill giant is here tossing rocks around.  Marbles perhaps?
description:
The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall. By his actions you
come to the conclusion that he's not very intelligent.  A perfect
playmate for you.

name: oldstyle brainy smurf
longDescription: Brainy Smurf is here, mumbling something to himself.
description:
Brainy Smurf has on his usual glasses.  Brainy Smurf isn't liked much by the
other smurfs.  They fear his knowledge.  Knowledge is power!

name: rabbit
longDescription: A rabbit is bouncing around here.
description: The rabbit smiles at you, completely harmless!

name: mage
longDescription:
A small intelligent looking mage is standing here. It looks like he
knows his way with magic.
description: This guy can ace the SAT with his frontal lobe tied behind his back.

name: oldstyle medium troll
longDescription: A troll is wandering around, attending to his duties.
description:
He is a tall, lean, furry humanoid.
He notices you, and is satisfied to find what he is looking for.
He advances toward you.

name: oldstyle handy smurf
longDescription: Handy Smurf is building something here.
description:
Handy is always building something.  He never takes a break.  Why don't you
give him a break, like all of his bones.

name: lizard
longDescription: A lizard slithers up to you.
description: It smiles at you, and tries to eat your leg.

name: troll
longDescription: This large mean-looking troll wants to take a closer look at you.
description:
Whilst you look at this troll, you realize he is trying to
figure just how tender you are.

name: oldstyle sleepy smurf
longDescription: Sleepy Smurf is sleep walking here.
description:
Sleepy never gets enough sleep.  You would think he goes to college.  I wonder
if he has ever stayed up a whole night without sleeping.

name: boar
longDescription: A boar tries to run you over.
description: It grunts at you.

name: guardian snake
longDescription: A large green snake is guardian for something.
description:
You take a closer look at this large snake while it tries to
bite your head off!

name: oldstyle hefty smurf
longDescription: Hefty Smurf is lifting weights here.
description:
Hefty is a total health nut.  He lifts weights, eats right, and exercises all
the time.  Won't do him much good when he's DEAD.

name: fox
longDescription: A fox is here staring at you.
description: It's fur might be worth money.

name: thief
longDescription: A thief, all dressed in black.
description: Well COUNT your money!

name: oldstyle grumpy smurf
longDescription: Grumpy Smurf is here, swearing.
description: Grumpy has never been happy in his whole life.  So why don't you just end it?

name: snail
longDescription: A snail is trying to get out of your way.
description: You don't see much but slime about it.

name: orc
longDescription: An ugly orc is standing here waiting for someone to practice on.
description: Yrkk..  He belches in your face!

name: beast
longDescription: A beast tries to feed off of you.
description: It looks mean.  You'd better run.

name: oldstyle jokey smurf
longDescription: Jokey Smurf is here, holding a present.
description:
Jokey loves to give people presents.  Too bad the present explodes when opened.
Oh well, to each his own.

name: centipede
longDescription: A small harmless centipede is here looking for some vegetation to eat.
description:
It doesn't seem to pay any attention towards you.  You are probably
not important.

name: bear
longDescription: A bear is here growling at you.
description: The bear must be bigger than you!  It wants to rip your head off.

name: oldstyle smurfette
longDescription: Smurfette is here, looking beautiful.
description:
Smurfette is the cutest little smurf you've ever seen.  If only she were your
size.  I wonder how much she charges the other smurfs.

name: warrior
longDescription: A human warrior grins an evil grin in your face.
description: He doesn't look friendly at all...  He is no Mr. Rogers!

name: wolf
longDescription: A wolf is here snarling at you.
description: The wolf doesn't want to be bothered.

name: oldstyle papa smurf
longDescription: Papa Smurf is practicing magic here.
description:
Yep, its Papa Smurf all right.  Red hat and boots and the funny little white
beard.  Papa Smurf treats his fellow smurfs with dignity and respect.  That
is why Papa Smurf is so popular among the ladies.

name: kobold
longDescription: A green kobold hobbles along the cave walls puking periodically.
description: It looks a little sick.  Something he ate maybe?

name: oldstyle gargamel
longDescription: Gargamel is here, cursing out the smurfs.
description:
Gargamel has never done anything right in his life.  He has caught smurfs
before but always lets them escape.  He brings true meaning to the word moron.

name: adept cleric
longDescription: An adept of Selene is here, grinning and selling you things.
description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

name: bat blue
longDescription: A blue bat flies in circles while electrical charges arc here and there.
description: Bzzzt.  Zap.  Crackle.  Speak about static electricity!

name: oldstyle azreal cat
longDescription: Azreal is here, licking himself.
description:
Gargamel's worthless cat.  He is just about as dumb as Gargamel.  He should
just grab a smurf in his teeth and chew away.

name: adept cleric
longDescription: An adept of Furey is here, training young students.
description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

name: bat red
longDescription: A red bat hangs upside down from the ceiling, glowing.
description: You can definitely feel some heat from this thing.  A fever perhaps?

name: priest cleric
longDescription: The priest of Circe is ready to help you practice.
description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

name: bat green
longDescription: A green bat flies from wall to wall leaving an awful smell.
description: Whew!  What a stinker!

name: diploma beast
longDescription: The hideous diploma beast is here, holding your graduation present!
description:
This horrible creature is your final test for mud school.  Kill him, and the
diploma is yours.

name: bat white
longDescription: A white bat rests on the ceiling.  You wonder where the cold is coming from.
description: Brrr!  You almost can't distinguish this bat from an ice cube.

name: bat black
longDescription: A black bat flies from wall to wall leaving something hissing behind.
description: Amazing!  This bat is grooming itself with acid!

name: thief
longDescription: A sneaky thief appears and disappears within the shadows.
description: He definitely knows what he's doing.  Trust him.

name: troll
longDescription: A large ugly troll is here mumbling something.
description: He looks quite mean.  Don't mess with him.

name: mage
longDescription: A small man is here researching magical incantations.
description:
His little head is buried into his magic books.  He'd be very
angry should you bother his studies.

name: snake
longDescription: A brown snake hisses at you.
description:
Sickly brown as it is, you know what it really wants is you
for dinner.

name: troll
longDescription: A 'small' troll is here happily dancing.  Trala-la-la.  La-la.
description: He is so happy, you are disgusted.  Kill him now!

name: orc
longDescription: A large orc growls in your face.
description: He is just looking for a fight isn't he?

name: oldstyle shadow guardian
longDescription: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.
description: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness ...

name: oldstyle adventurer
longDescription: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.
description: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.

name: oldstyle edgar
longDescription: Edgar the Human Swordpupil
description:
Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?'

You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty
bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!

name: oldstyle diamond golem
longDescription: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.
description: It looks quite strong.

name: oldstyle mage young
longDescription: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.
description:
He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe.
Then again, he may just have a headache.

name: oldstyle strick bartender
longDescription: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.
description: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.

name: oldstyle tatorious wizard
longDescription: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.
description: Tatorious winks at you mischievously.

name: oldstyle ezmerelda cook
longDescription: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.

name: oldstyle assistant mage
longDescription: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.

name: oldstyle prisoner
longDescription: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.
description:
Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they must
have been fine garments. A metal muzzle has been fitted over the poor
wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence his spell
casting you cannot tell.

He looks quite mad, no doubt he's been mistreated horribly.

name: oldstyle zeus god
longDescription: Zeus sits here on a throne.
description:
You see before you the greatest of the Olympians.  It seems as if he could
destroy you with a thought.  Every glance penetrates deep into your soul.
You now know what true fear is.

name: oldstyle jailor mage
longDescription: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.
description: He looks rather dirty.

name: oldstyle prometheus
longDescription: Prometheus is here, playing with a match.
description:
This mortal risked the wrath of Zeus to give the gift of fire to humans.  He
looks up at you and smiles.

name: oldstyle broom
longDescription: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.
description: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'

name: oldstyle hermes
longDescription: Hermes is busy, delivering a message.
description:
This is the messenger of the Gods.  He wears a winged helm and boots, and
darts from place to place.  He looks very busy, and it seems as if he doesn't
even notice your presence.

name: oldstyle lesser guardian hands
longDescription: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.
description: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.

name: oldstyle poseidon
longDescription: Poseidon is dining here.
description:
He is the brother of Zeus himself, chosen to rule the seas.  He must be
visiting Mount Olympus.  He nods at you and motions for you to enter and
have a seat.

name: oldstyle guardian greater eyes
longDescription: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.
description: The eyes smolder with hatred.

name: oldstyle apollo
longDescription: Apollo is here, playing a tune.
description:
This jovial God is strumming on a lyre.  He smiles at you and asks you to
join him.  You notice a dangerous looking bow by his side, however, and think
that he knows more than music.

name: oldstyle ares
longDescription: Ares is here, kicking your ass.
description:
The God of War is here, studying some maps.  He scowls at you as you enter
and says 'I am very busy.  What do you want?'

name: oldstyle mage visitor
longDescription: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.
description: He looks quite sleepy.

name: oldstyle apprentice young
longDescription: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.
description: She looks quite intent on her studies.

name: oldstyle athena
longDescription: Athena is relaxing here.
description:
Zeus' favorite daughter is sitting on a couch eating grapes.  She smiles at
you and invites you to join her.

name: oldstyle apprentice young
longDescription: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.
description: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.

name: oldstyle hephaestus smith
longDescription: Hephaestus the Smith is here, crafting a fine weapon.
description:
This God is the only one who is not physically perfect.  He is lame and very
ugly.  You get the impression that he is kind, however, and would go out of his
way to help you.  He is attended by three golden maidens.

name: oldstyle apprentice young
longDescription: A young apprentice is sleeping here.
description: He seems to be dreaming.

name: oldstyle handmaid golden
longDescription: A Handmaid of gold is here, assisting the smith.
description:
As you gaze upon this creation, you realize that she is made from solid
gold.  She seems to be very lifelike as she assists the smith in his work.

name: oldstyle apprentice young
longDescription: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.
description: He looks like a mischievous youth.

name: oldstyle soldier
longDescription: A soldier is here, assisting Ares.
description:
This man is waiting on Ares.  Although he does not look very strong, you
realize that Ares would not have any weaklings working for him.

name: oldstyle kitten
longDescription: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.
description:
The little ball of fur looks very unhappy.  Singed fur and a few minor burns
mark its mottled coat.

name: oldstyle musician apprentice
longDescription: A musician is here, learning from Apollo.
description:
This man has mastered his first profession, and is now studying music from the
immortal Apollo.

name: oldstyle student
longDescription: A student of spells is here looking quite bored
description: The student yawns.

name: oldstyle boy serving servant
longDescription: A servant is here, feeding Athena her grapes.
description: This boy is truly lucky to be able to serve Athena herself.

name: oldstyle hound dog war
longDescription: A large hound snarls at you.
description:
This great beast can barely be called a dog.  It has been bred to cause fear
on the battle field, and you have no doubt that it does its job well.

name: oldstyle instructor teacher mage
longDescription: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.
description: He looks quite angry at your interruption.

name: oldstyle student
longDescription: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.
description: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.

name: oldstyle Odin
longDescription: Odin is resting here.
description:
As you gaze at Odin, you realize how insignificant you truly are.  He towers
over you, and is so intent on his activities that he barely recognizes your
presence.

name: oldstyle teacher mage
longDescription: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.

name: oldstyle grocer greengrocer julius
longDescription: Julius the Green Grocer stands here.
description:
This jovial man has devoted his life to selling fruit and other foods to the
inhabitants of this city.  Although he may seem like a wimp, it would be wise
not to underestimate him.  He smiles warmly at you and shows you his selection
of delicious looking foods.

name: oldstyle asp snake
longDescription: A small, poisonous asp slithers over your feet.
description:
The asp is a small, smooth-scaled snake the color of worn pottery.
The poison bite of this snake has felled many a mighty pharoah.

name: oldstyle alchemist
longDescription: The ancient, wizened Alchemist stands here.
description:
Skilled in all manner of magic, as well as the ancient art of alchemy, he
stands ready to supply the citizens here (but not you) with all manner of
arcane supplies.

name: oldstyle student
longDescription: A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.
description: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.

name: oldstyle cobra snake
longDescription: A cobra snake rears up and opens its fearsome hood.
description:
The cobra snake waves back and forth before you, its hood displaying brilliant
colors designed to serve notice to its prey that it is about to strike.

name: oldstyle clive
longDescription: Clive the Weapons Master is practicing with his bow and axe.
description:
Clive looks VERY big and VERY tough.  All those years in the army must have
paid off.

name: oldstyle wizard speaker mage
longDescription: An old wizard is here making a speech

name: oldstyle mongoose
longDescription: A small mongoose slinks along the ground, hunting snakes.
description:
The mongoose is a wily rodent, a quick hunter of nasty poisonous snakes.
She sniffs you and appears to be looking for food in your hand.

name: oldstyle armourer samuel
longDescription: Samuel the Armourer glares at you.
description:
Samuel looks just like Clive the Weapons Master: VERY big and VERY tough.
He doesn't like what you've been doing in his city.

name: oldstyle pyramid watcher
longDescription: The pyramid watcher protects the tombs from intruders.
description:
The pyramid watcher has made a pledge to destroy any would-be looters of
the tombs of the pharoahs.  He is clad from head to foot in utilitarian
sand-colored clothing.

name: oldstyle mage young
longDescription: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.

name: oldstyle ra sun god
longDescription: Ra the Egyptian Sun God is resting here.
description:
Ra is very bright!  It hurts your eyes to look at him, so you can tell little
about his appearance.  What you can tell, however, suggests that he is no one
to be trifled with.

name: oldstyle thief tomb
longDescription: A sneaky tomb thief moves about in search of treasure.
description: The thief brushes against you briefly, then slinks back into the shadows.

name: oldstyle mistress battle
longDescription: The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.
description:
She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic
user.

name: oldstyle chimera
longDescription: A chimera prowls the cell.
description:
This bizarre creature has three heads - one of a goat, one of a lion, and one
of a dragon.  It growls at you as you enter the cell, then suddenly attacks!

name: oldstyle mage teacher
longDescription: A spell teacher is here relaxing.

name: oldstyle ali baba thief
longDescription: Ali Baba is here, hunting for the pharoah's tomb.
description:
You see a tall, full-bearded man with a mischevious glint in his eye.  Ali Baba
has made his life from stealing things from others, including many items stolen
recently from under the nose of the hapless guardians of this pyramid.  Someday
he might get caught, but not today...

name: oldstyle hera
longDescription: Hera is here.
description:
Hera, the wife of Zeus is here.  She smiles at you as you enter and invites you
to rest and sit for a while.

name: oldstyle magic carpet
longDescription: A small woven carpet lies under your feet.
description:
The carpet is simply beautiful, made from intricately woven silken material.
It seems to rise up at the touch of your feet.  Wait, it is rising, a few feet
above the ground!  In fact, it seems to be ALIVE!

name: oldstyle wizard
longDescription: An aged wizard is sleeping here.

name: oldstyle roc
longDescription: A roc is here.
description:
This is a giant bird.  It looks at you quizzically, then makes a noise and
looks away.

name: oldstyle mummy corpse
longDescription: A mummy reaches for you, disturbed by your presence.
description:
You only see the disfigured, rotting features of decaying human flesh,
animated by the distempered spirit of a long-deceased person.

name: oldstyle scribe mage
longDescription: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.

name: oldstyle citizen resident
longDescription: A citizen of this town is strolling down the street here.
description: He looks happy and carefree.  He smiles and tips his hat to you.

name: oldstyle sand man sandman
longDescription: A sandman rises up from the desert floor.
description:
The sandman is exactly that -- some sort of strange being formed from the sands
of the desert floor.  It seems quite large and strong and at home in the heat
and sandy winds.

name: oldstyle scribe mage
longDescription: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.
description:
She's quite cute.  Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of
lore she is translating.

name: oldstyle pegasus horse
longDescription: A large horse with wings is here.
description:
This horse is snow white with large wings.  Although it doesn't look very
threatening, it seems as though it would be dangerous if provoked.

name: oldstyle master scribe
longDescription: The master scribe is here looking a little upset
description:
He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle.
The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'

name: oldstyle efreeti efreet
longDescription: The efreeti stands here, sheathed in a column of fire.
description:
The efreeti is a mighty being formed from living fire.  He gazes down at you
with disdain and scorn, arms folded across his mighty chest.

name: oldstyle cook
longDescription: A cook is here, hard at work.
description: This man looks as is he has been spending WAY too much time in the kitchen.

name: oldstyle assistant scribe
longDescription: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.

name: oldstyle caryatid column
longDescription: A sandstone column stands here, carved into a feminine figure.
description:
The column has been carved into a set of four shapely women, each facing
outward into the room.  The sandstone of the caryatid is smooth with age,
but you can still make out a deadly stone sword in the hands of each figure.

name: oldstyle jailer
longDescription: The jailer is here, watching for intruders.
description:
He looks as though he has spent a lot of time underground, guarding the
prisoners.

name: oldstyle djinn genie
longDescription: The djinn issues forth from the confines of a small lamp.
description:
The djinn is a mighty being formed from the air itself and frequently
imprisoned in a small lamp, used to do the bidding of those who find him.
He smiles down at you congenially, arms folded across his blue-tinged
skin, and strokes his goatee.

name: oldstyle master enchanter mage
longDescription: The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.

name: oldstyle hieracosphinx sphinx
longDescription: A hieracosphinx looks at you cunningly.
description:
The hieracosphinx are cunning, small, but nasty creatures, having the heads
of birds, mighty wingspans, and a full set of four paws to rend their victims
to pieces.  They tend to be quite jealous of the sharper wits of their older
cousins.

name: oldstyle sword dancing
longDescription: A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.
description: It looks quite sharp.

name: oldstyle gynosphinx sphinx
longDescription: A gynosphinx sits here, befuddled by a riddle.
description:
The gynosphinx is a crafty but gentle creature, having the body of a
beautiful dark-skinned woman from the waist up, a feathery set of wings
and the hind legs of a mighty cat.  Right now she is confused, having
just heard a puzzling riddle from a cousin criosphinx.

name: oldstyle alchemist
longDescription: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.
description:
He looks like he's been quaffing too many potions. His eyes dart around
wildly, and he starts to drool.

The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!

name: oldstyle criosphinx sphinx
longDescription: A criosphinx calmly watches you.
description:
The criosphinx is a calm and friendly creature, having the head of a ram atop
the body of a well-furred feline with eagle-like wings.  He delights in riddles,
and in poking occasional fun at his easily confused lesser cousins.

name: oldstyle master summoner
longDescription: The master summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.

name: oldstyle androsphinx sphinx
longDescription: A mighty androsphinx tosses its lion-like mane.
description:
The mighty androsphinx is a huge creature, with the body of a lion whose
face  is quite man-like, perhaps even handsome, and a massive pair of feathered
wings.  Tales are told of pharoahs that were rendered permanently deaf by the
mighty roar of this sphinx.

name: oldstyle master charmer
longDescription: The master charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.
description: The master charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.

name: oldstyle great sphinx
longDescription:
A mighty sphinx rests here in the sand, dormant now for centuries.
The great sphinx appears to be indestructible!
description:
The great sphinx towers tens of feet above you, resting here in a state of
dormancy.  It has become almost indistinguishable from the sand that surrounds
it, although you can still make out the features of the handsome face that once
advised many rulers.

name: oldstyle golem wooden
longDescription: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.
description: He looks flammable.

name: oldstyle ramses mummy
longDescription: You have awakened the mighty servant to the pharoahs, Ramses.
description:
As your light spills over his face and body, you can see his features begin
to fill out, swell, and harden, until an apparently healthy man stands before
you, clad only in the raiments he was left in when he last slept.  His hair is
a soft black, his skin a deep chocolate, and his tall frame is totally still,
his chest not even moving to breathe.

name: oldstyle master binder
longDescription: The master spell binder is here re-charging a blackened wand.
description: The master spell binder snarls at you and attacks.

name: oldstyle master maker
longDescription: The golem maker is here chiseling some stone.

name: oldstyle golem granite
longDescription: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.
description: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.

name: oldstyle golem bronze
longDescription: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.
description: He looks rather dim witted.

name: oldstyle golem flesh
longDescription: A flesh golem stands guard here
description:
It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't even
resemble anything human.

name: oldstyle golem cloth
longDescription: A cloth golem wanders around here.
description: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.

name: oldstyle golem adamantite
longDescription: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
description:
It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable,
but somewhat un-intelligent.

name: oldstyle golem clay
longDescription: A clay golem stands guard here.

name: oldstyle master illusionist mage
longDescription: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.
description:
The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon was
now stands a small harmless looking old man.

name: oldstyle necromancer master
longDescription: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants
description:
Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite
an imposing figure.  A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing
embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow.
The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.

name: oldstyle skeleton undead
longDescription: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.
description: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.

name: oldstyle undead giant
longDescription: An undead giant lumbers towards you.

name: oldstyle witch hag
longDescription: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.
description:
She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing.  From about where
her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes your skin
crawl with revulsion.

name: oldstyle librarian mage
longDescription: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.
description: He looks like a rather peaceful old man.

name: oldstyle apprentice
longDescription: The master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.
description:
A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance
has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the
great master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover
alone.

name: oldstyle cat grey familiar
longDescription: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.
description:
The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs
contentedly.  It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large claws.

name: oldstyle master guildmaster grey
longDescription: The master of Neutrality stands here contemplating the balance of the universe.
description: He looks quite peaceful.

name: oldstyle apprentice black
longDescription: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.
description:
She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once she
must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to be a
permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.

name: oldstyle cat black familiar
longDescription: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.
description:
It looks both mean and dangerous.  Petting seems to be completely out of
the question.

name: oldstyle master guildmaster black
shortDescription: the master of the black robes
longDescription: The master of the black robes is here plotting vile deeds.
description: The master glares at you.

name: oldstyle apprentice white
longDescription: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.
description:
He looks like a fanatic.
The apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honor!'

name: oldstyle cat white familiar
longDescription: A white cat is here preening its fur.
description: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.

name: oldstyle master guildmaster white
longDescription: The master of goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.
description: He looks like a self-righteous bastard.

name: oldstyle cat calico familiar
longDescription: A large calico cat is here
description:
It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species.
A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.

name: oldstyle guildmaster grand mistress
longDescription: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
description:
She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and
pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her
youthful appearance through the use of strong magics.
The Grand Master pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.

name: oldstyle wizard
longDescription: A wandering wizard is here mumbling to himself.

name: wizard
longDescription: A wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.
description:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
wizard. He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
rings and bracelets.

name: oldstyle elven wizard
longDescription: An Elven Wizard is here, creating fireworks for the festivities.
description:
The Elven Wizard looks at you in a solemn sort of way.  His gaze seems to
penetrate through your innermost being.  He is wearing a silvery cloak
and holding a multi-colored staff.  Although he appears to be older
than the oldest man, he seems to have an inner strength which most mortals
cannot overcome.

name: baker
longDescription: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
description:
A fat, nice looking baker. But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.

name: grocer
longDescription: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
description: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.

name: oldstyle ring keeper
longDescription: The Keeper of the Ring is here, guarding his treasure jealously.
description:
The Ring Keeper is a rather big but short halfling.  His short stature and
bulbous nose belie his true nature.  An elven sword that glows with a blue
light hangs from his belt, and on his finger you see the One Ring.  Although
usually a halfling of peace, he will fight you to the death if you attempt
to take away that which belongs to him.

name: weaponsmith
longDescription: A weaponsmith.
description: A young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn.

name: oldstyle farmer gamgee
longDescription: Farmer Gamgee sniffs the air, wondering if harvest time is near.
description:
Farmer Gamgee is a short, stout halfling of thirty years.  His skin has
been tanned from working the fields night and day.  He's quite a jolly
chap, always ready to befriend an injured bunny rabbit.

name: armourer armorer
longDescription: An armourer stands here.
description:
An old but very strong armourer, he has made more armours in his
lifetime than you have ever seen.

name: oldstyle toddler
longDescription: A toddler crawls about, looking for something to chew on.
description:
The toddler is dressed in nothing but his birthday suit.  He crawls about
for he hasn't learned to walk yet.  He peers up at you and asks "da da?"

name: thief
longDescription: A thief, all dressed in black.
description: Well COUNT your money!

name: oldstyle nursemaid
longDescription: A nursemaid wanders about, trying to keep track of all the toddlers.
description:
The nursemaid looks rather tired and worn out.  Taking care of so many
toddlers for too long has evidently taken its toll.  She looks to you and
in her eyes you can see her longing for a better life.

name: captain
longDescription: A retired captain stands here, selling boats.
description: This captain has killed more sharks than you have eaten peas.

name: oldstyle cow
longDescription: A cow is here, chewing her cud.
description:
The cow looks like it hasn't been milked in quite some time.  Although she
is past her prime, you see that she still has a lot of years left, and that
if provoked, her rear kick can be quite deadly.

name: sailor
longDescription: A sailor stands here, waiting to train you.
description: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

name: oldstyle pig
longDescription: A pig wallows in the mud and oinks in contentment.
description:
The pig appears quite happy to be a pig.  He is oblivious to your presence
and cares only for the care-free life that he leads.  It is enormously fat
and consequently cannot move around very quickly.

name: boy
longDescription: A pet shop boy is here, humming gently.
description: He is young and close-cropped and looks quite happy.

name: oldstyle killer frog
longDescription: A killer frog rises up out of the water.
description: The killer frog looks ravenous.

name: jeweller
longDescription: The jeweller is standing behind the desk.
description: He is fat and has a content although watchful look on his face.

name: oldstyle chicken
longDescription: A chicken sits on her nest.
description: The chicken is bright and healthy.  She has no weapons but her beak.

name: oldstyle stone gargoyle
longDescription: A stone gargoyle looms over you.
description: As you look, the figure seems to shift and move ...

name: leather worker
longDescription: The leather worker is sitting by the table, sewing a leather cap.
description:
She looks as an honest, hard-working artisan who only just earns enough to
keep herself going.

name: oldstyle bull
longDescription: A bull scratches at the ground and lowers his head.
description:
The bull is in top condition.  He looks like quite a fighter, nothing to be
reckoned with.  With his horns and his hooves he can attack just about
anything.

name: oldstyle angry gargoyle
longDescription: An angry gargoyle glares at you.
description: He looks ready to attack!

name: Hassan
longDescription: Hassan is here, waiting to dispense some justice.
description:
Big. Very big.
Stupid. Very stupid.

Hassan, the guardian of  the Temple of Mota, towers over you.  He's over 12
feet tall, every inch of it muscle. It would be a Bad Thing to commit a crime
in his presence.

name: oldstyle horse
longDescription: A horse becomes frightened by your presence.
description: The horse looks at you and turns away.  You can tell that it is afraid of you.

name: oldstyle elite gargoyle
longDescription: An elite gargoyle guards this room against intrusion.
description: He snarls at you and says LEAVE OR DIE!

name: healer
longDescription: A healer is here, selling spells.
description:
Although retired from adventuring, the healer still lends a hand.
Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.

name: oldstyle shiriff
longDescription: A shiriff of the Shire looks for signs of trouble.
description:
The shiriff is over waist high, quite tall for a halfling.  His eyes are
ever roaming, looking for signs of trouble from riff-raff like you.  In
his belt is a thin dagger, and on his body he wears a suit of leather armor.
This is one halfling you don't want to mess with.

name: oldstyle gargoyle shaman
longDescription: The gargoyle shaman is here, preparing to do battle.
description: She says 'I can SEE you! I have been waiting ...'.

name: guildmaster master
longDescription: Your guildmaster is standing here.
description:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses. She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

name: oldstyle carnivorous plant
longDescription: Amidst the jungle here, a huge Carnivorous plant reaches out to grab you!
description: The plant looks something like a Venus fly-trap, only MUCH larger.

name: oldstyle shiriff
longDescription: A shiriff of the Shire looks for signs of trouble.
description:
The shiriff is over waist high, quite tall for a halfling.  His eyes are
ever roaming, looking for signs of trouble from riff raff like you.  In
his belt is a thin dagger, and on his body he wears a suit of leather armor.
This is one halfling you don't want to mess with.

name: guildmaster master
longDescription: Your guildmaster is standing here.
description:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your god; he has
a peaceful, loving look. You notice that he is surrounded by a white aura.

name: oldstyle gruesome ogre
longDescription: A huge, gruesome ogre is sprawled here, gnawing some strange meat.
description: It thinks that perhaps you would make a better meal.

name: oldstyle thain
longDescription: The Thain commands respect from all Shire folk.
description:
A personable yet serious halfling, the Thain looks at you and yells a
deep 'Hullo'.  He walks about comfortably, secure in the knowledge that
as long as he's in office, the Shire will always remain a safe haven for
Shire folk.

name: oldstyle shadow
longDescription: A dark shadow moves about the room.
description: The Shadow is vaguely humanoid. Two glowing pinpoints look at you.

name: guildmaster master
longDescription: Your guildmaster is standing here.
description:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it:
the way of the true thief.  She is dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.

unique~
