0 0 medium 0

name: oldstyle innkeeper
longDescription: The Innkeeper stands here awaiting your order.
description:
The Innkeeper is a jolly old halfling who spends his days eavesdropping on
local gossip.  In his younger days, he was quite a seasoned traveller.

name: guildmaster master
longDescription: Your guildmaster is standing here.
description:
This is your master. A short, strong dwarf with bulging muscles.  Several scars
across his body prove that he was using arms before you were born.  He
has a calm look on his face.

name: oldstyle evil wight
longDescription: An evil wight lurks in the shadows!
description: He glares at you savagely and charges!

name: oldstyle burly minotaur
longDescription: A burly minotaur watches you solemnly.
description: This powerful creature wonders whether to kill you or not ...

name: oldstyle miller
longDescription: The Miller is here, overseeing his busy mill workers.
description:
The Miller is an impatient young halfling, always trying to command more
respect from his workers than he can get.  He looks like the type of person
who deserves a spanking but never got one.

name: sorcerer
longDescription: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
description:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive
as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

name: oldstyle savage minotaur
longDescription: A bloodthirsty minotaur slowly counts his loot
description: He looks up at you and screams 'SO! Coming to steal my hoard!'

name: oldstyle mill worker
longDescription: The mill worker runs to and fro.
description:
The mill worker is in fine shape from the hard labor that he does at the
mill.  He doesn't notice your presence, but he looks like he could break you
in two without thinking about it.

name: templar
longDescription: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.
description:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith.
His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel attacks and
his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly
opponent.

name: oldstyle minotaur captain
longDescription: Sitting here in this room is the Minotaur Captain.
description: He looks at you, and a sinister grin slowly spreads on his face ...

name: oldstyle elven warrior
longDescription: The elven warrior watches you solemnly.
description:
The tall elven warrior is light and fair-skinned.  The expression that he wears
on his countenance is solemn and tragic.  He cares not for this world any
longer and wearies of it.

name: assassin
longDescription: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
description:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as possible,
using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how and where to use
them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes him a deadly opponent.

name: oldstyle black pudding
longDescription: A huge black pudding fills the center of the room!!
description: It is a huge black blob that oozes about the room. Its heading toward YOU!

name: oldstyle dwarven prince
longDescription: The dwarven prince sits here patiently for the return of his king.
description:
Grim and cold, the dwarven prince is quite strong and bulky, even for the
dwarves of his land.  His glowing eyes peer out of his bushy face and stare
beyond your gaze.

name: knight
longDescription: A knight is guarding the entrance.
description:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.

name: oldstyle shopkeeper
longDescription: The shopkeeper smiles and patiently waits for you to buy something.
description:
The shopkeeper will fight like a madman to protect his store from riff-raff
like you.

name: oldstyle lesser golem
longDescription: A lesser Golem stands guarding the entrance.
description: The golem appears to be made of some kind of clay, enchanted to come to life!

name: bartender
longDescription: A bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.
description: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.

name: oldstyle grocer
longDescription: The grocer offers you the finest breads in all the land.
description:
The grocer is a large, jovial halfling who knows how to enjoy his pipeweed.
However, he also knows that it's worth protecting and so will do everything
in his power to prevent riff-raff like you from stealing it.

name: oldstyle ancient wyvern
longDescription: An enormous, ancient wyvern stares down at your tiny form...
description: It thunders loudly 'I must protect my Master's wealth!'

name: waiter
longDescription: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
description: A tired looking waiter.

name: oldstyle blacksmith
longDescription: The blacksmith bids you welcome to his humble store.
description:
The blacksmith is a lean and mean fighting machine.  His knowledge of weapons
and armour would certainly help him in any fight against riff-raff like you.

name: oldstyle spectre
longDescription: A spectre has begun to materialize in front of you!
description: Terror fills your heart as you view this master of the undead.

name: waiter
longDescription:
A man who in his young days was a famous sorcerer but now leads a quiet,
peaceful life as a waiter.

name: oldstyle trapper
longDescription: A trapper stands here, bartering his pelts.
description: The trapper is clad mostly in the fur of various animals he's caught.

name: waiter
longDescription: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with God.

name: oldstyle battle master
longDescription: The battle master offers you the services of his fine trainees.
description: The battle master is a wizened fighter, with many scars to prove his worth.

name: oldstyle hunter
longDescription: A hunter rests in here, carrying a fresh kill.
description: The hunter is rugged and sturdy from his occupation.

name: waiter
longDescription: A waiter who knows where all his customers keep their money.

name: oldstyle halfling youth
longDescription: A halfling youth stands here, waiting for nothing in particular.
description:
The halfling youth is not yet quite in the prime of his youth.  He's knee
high and you get the sudden urge to step on him.

name: waiter
longDescription: A waiter who easily could kill you, and still carry quite a few firebreathers.

name: oldstyle ranger
longDescription: A grim ranger reclines at a table.
description: The years of wanderings have left the ranger hardened and strong.

name: oldstyle seasoned adventurer
longDescription: A seasoned adventurer sits here, telling tales of fame and fortune.
description:
The seasoned adventurer has seen his share of glory days.  Although he is
past his prime, he still looks like he could put up more than his share of
a good fight.

name: oldstyle local gossip
longDescription: A local gossip asks you, "Have you heard the latest?"
description:
The gossip is all talk and no action.  You're transfixed by her ability to
talk so much so quickly.

name: oldstyle ranger leader
longDescription: A leader of the Rangers is watching you solemnly.
description: This individual has quite a reputation at the local trading posts!

name: filthy
longDescription: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.
description:
Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty. He likes to keep his costumers happy,
but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

name: cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard stands here.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: oldstyle ranger lord
longDescription: The Lord of the Rangers catches your eye.

name: oldstyle halfling beauty
longDescription: A halfling beauty stares dreamily into your eyes.
description:
She is the most beautiful creature you've seen in quite some time.  As you
stare at her, thoughts of all else vanish.  You get the sudden urge to grovel
at her feet, hoping she'll take you in like a lost puppy.  You wouldn't dare
harm a hair on her precious little head.

name: oldstyle male centaur
longDescription: A male centaur wanders about this area.
description: The centaur has the upper torso of a man and lower body of a horse.

name: janitor
longDescription: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.

name: oldstyle trainee
longDescription: A trainee screams a death cry as he delivers the fatal blow to a dummy.
description:
The trainee smiles smugly, aware of your interest in him.  He's a little
fresh, but his enthusiasm and desire to please more than make up for what
he lacks in skill.

name: oldstyle chic urbanite
longDescription: A chic urbanite sits here, enjoying his class status.
description:
The urbanite seems very much at home in his surroundings.  His clothes are
all of the latest fashions and his manners impeccable.  He offers you some
coins if you'd be so good as to order a drink for him.

name: fido dog
longDescription: A beastly fido is here.
description:
Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging
around its teeth.

name: oldstyle female centaur
longDescription: A female centaur wanders about this area.
description: The centaur has the upper torso of a woman and lower body of a horse.

name: oldstyle country bumpkin
longDescription: A country bumpkin dreams of pipeweed and its many uses.
description: The country bumpkin snores noisily.

name: vagabond
longDescription: A vagabond is here, looking for victims.
description: He looks pretty mean.

name: oldstyle old centaur
longDescription: An old centaur is resting in a corner.
description: This centaur has lived a full life.

name: drunk
longDescription: A singing, happy drunk wanders around, singing about Moria.
description: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

name: oldstyle innkeeper
longDescription: The Innkeeper stands here awaiting your order.
description:
The Innkeeper is a jolly old halfling who spends his days eavesdropping on
local gossip.  In his younger days, he was quite a seasoned traveller.

name: oldstyle centaur elder
longDescription: One of the centaur elders is here, watching you.
description: The elders act as counselors and advisors to the chief.

name: oldstyle receptionist
longDescription: The receptionist sits here, signing forms.
description: He is a very professional looking type.

name: beggar
longDescription: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
description: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

name: oldstyle centaur guard
longDescription: A strong centaur is standing guard here.
description: He appears to be blocking entrance to the next room.

name: oldstyle centaur chief
longDescription: The chief of the centaur villagers reclines here.
description:
He has been the leader of this tribe for many years, and has acquired much
wisdom.

name: cat
longDescription: An alley cat hisses at you.
description: The alley cat is half starved and more than a little feral.

name: oldstyle shiriff
longDescription: A shiriff of the Shire looks for the lost halfling youth.
description:
The shiriff is over waist high, quite tall for a halfling.
He looks at you, smiles and asks you if you have seen a halfling youth
somewhere outside the shire.

name: cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: oldstyle displacer beast
longDescription: A displacer beast is grazing nearby.
description: As you watch this strange creature, its position seems to flicker and shift.

name: cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard is here, guarding the mayor.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: shopkeeper old man
longDescription:
An old man eyes you greedily.
The old man says, 'Would you like to buy a nice love potion?'
description: He looks very dangerous.  I wouldn't try to rob him.

name: cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate alertly.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.  He is half asleep.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: kitten cat pet
longDescription: A small loyal kitten is here.
description: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

name: oldstyle beholder
longDescription: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
description:
It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten
eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you
to disintegrate you.  Beholders are not known for their personality.

name: puppy dog pet
longDescription: A small loyal puppy is here.
description: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

name: oldstyle lamia beast
longDescription: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
description:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

name: beagle dog pet
longDescription: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.
description: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

name: oldstyle mimic chest
longDescription: A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
description:
A strong, wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy pad-lock on the
front.

name: oldstyle mimic boulder
longDescription: Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.

name: rottweiler dog pet
longDescription: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.
description: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

name: wolf pet
longDescription: A large, trained wolf is here.
description: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

name: oldstyle mimic floor
longDescription: The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.

name: eagle bird pet
longDescription: A loyal eagle circles overhead.
description: The eagle looks like a strong fierce fighter.

name: oldstyle mimic pottery
longDescription: Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.

name: lion pet
longDescription: A large, faithful lion is here.
description: The great lion looks very fierce.

name: oldstyle mimic planks
longDescription: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.

name: oldstyle lizard horned
longDescription: A small horned lizard flicks his tongue and slithers away.
description: A cute little lizard, that is, if you like reptiles!

name: tiger pet
longDescription: A great, loyal tiger is here.
description: The large, striped tiger looks like a savage fighter.

name: oldstyle golem stone
longDescription: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
description:
It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant
stone creature. He stands here still guarding the city.

name: maid
longDescription: The maid is waiting for your order.
description:
She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes. A good reason
for coming here more often.

name: sexton
longDescription: A sexton is sitting here, drinking hot tea.
description: The sexton looks like he is relaxing after another grave-digging job.

name: swan
longDescription: A swan is swimming around in the pond.
description: The white swan is very elegant.

name: duckling
longDescription: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
description: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

name: sparrow
longDescription: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.
description: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

name: duck
longDescription: A duck is here, quacking happily.
description: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.

name: captain
longDescription: The captain of the guard is looking very upset.
description: A big, strong, angry captain.

name: cityguard guard
longDescription: A cityguard stands here, looking very upset.
description: A big, strong, angry guard.

name: secretary
longDescription: A secretary is sitting at the desk.
description:
She looks very busy.
The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Mayor is extremely busy today'.
The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime'.

name: mayor
longDescription: The mayor is here.  He shakes your hand.
description: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.

name: crier
longDescription: The town crier is here, weeping quietly.
description: He is very good at his job - completely dissolved in tears.

name: esme waitress
longDescription: Esme the waitress hums to herself and wonders what you'd like to order.
description:
Esme brushes a lock of dark hair away from her wire-rimmed glasess and
smiles warmly at you.

name: Melancholy
longDescription: Melancholy is here, digging through a pile of scrolls, papers, and maps.
description:
Ragged brown hair frames a ghostly, pale face.  Puffy eyelids surround two
sky blue, haunting eyes.  An old, brown robe is wrapped around her frail
frame.  She looks up from her pile of papers and maps and looks inquiringly
at you, smiling faintly.

name: lister green tree snake
longDescription: A green tree snake is sitting here on a pile of books.
description:
This is Melancholy's pet tree snake, Lister.  Something seems odd about his
jaw, almost as if he were smiling at you.  He's quite friendly, but don't
get him drunk.

name: otho money changer moneychanger
longDescription: Otho the Money Changer sits behind his desk, waiting for your coins.
description:
Otho is grotesquely fat man dressed in rich clothes.  Apparently the money
changing business pays quite well in this busy city, or possibly the rumors
of his fencing services are true...

name: thief
longDescription: A thief, all dressed in black.
description: Well COUNT your money!

name: oldstyle mud monster mudmonster
longDescription: A horrifying mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...
description:
It sure looks like something out of a horror movie. It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.

name: oldstyle bat
longDescription: The small fierce-looking bat is hanging from the ceiling.
description:
You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature,
though it looks rather peaceful, hanging there. The thought of arousing this
cruel creature doesn't seem appealing.

name: oldstyle rat
longDescription: The huge hungry-looking sewer rat sits here.

name: oldstyle spider
longDescription: The small hairy spider.

name: oldstyle beetle
longDescription: The giant mean-looking earth beetle crawls towards you.

name: oldstyle maggot
longDescription: The giant maggot crawls toward you.

name: oldstyle snake
longDescription: The snake slithers towards you.

name: oldstyle wanderer
longDescription: The evil wanderer stares at you.
description: The evil wanderer is very thin.  He is dressed in a grey cloak.

name: oldstyle homonculus homo
longDescription: The homonculus is here, looking at you with an evil look.
description:
The Homonculus appears in a man-like form, about 18'' tall, it has a
greenish, reptilian skin, leathery wings, and a bat-like mouth, with
teeth gleaming yellow.

name: oldstyle chreffn
longDescription: The chreffn are crawling here, looking around with their yellow eyes.
description:
The head and torso of a chreffn is copper-covered, with yellow,
glowing eyes. The lower body is in an orange shading.

name: oldstyle morkoth
longDescription: The morkoth is standing here, waiting for someone to KILL!
description:
It's a five feet tall, shadow monster. The shape of this creature lies
somewhere between a human and a rat. It breaths very heavily, while staring
at you with such a glint in the eyes that reminds you of immense hunger.

name: oldstyle mud monster mudmonster
longDescription: A horrifying mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...
description:
It sure looks like something out of a horror movie. It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.

name: oldstyle red dragon
longDescription: The red fierce-looking dragon stares at you angrily.
description:
The red dragon stares at you, angrily, as it wakes when you
arrives.  It says 'Oh, human YOU woke me up ... Hsss', while
it moves closer.  'Can one NEVER sleep in peace ... Hsss'.

name: oldstyle sea hag
longDescription: The sea hag is swimming around here.
description:
The sea hag is so ghastly looking that you feel the deepest fear.
Big yellow eyes and sharp teeth.  Its ears are very big,
and it has small sharp horns.  It hates beauty.

name: oldstyle guardian naga
longDescription: The guardian naga looks kindly at you.
description:
The naga are a snake-liked creature. She is covered in green-gold
scale with silvery triangles along her back. Her eyes are golden.
She notice that you look at her, and she says: 'Watch out. This way
leads to some evil creatures'.

name: oldstyle basilisk
longDescription: The scaled basilisk crawls towards you slowly.
description:
The basilisk is a reptilian monster. It has eight legs, and a strong
toothy jaws. It is dull brown with yellowish underbelly. It's eyes are
glowing pale green.

name: oldstyle lemure blob
longDescription: The lemure blob slithers terribly precisely towards you for an attack!
description:
This looks like a vaguely human blob. Big black yellow eyes, and a
mouth going a little bit out from the face. The lemure does not look
interested in you at all, but anyway it attacks. It looks like it's
mind has been burned out.

name: oldstyle jones cruncher ettin
longDescription: Jones 'Cruncher' the ettin is standing here glaring at you.
description:
At the first sight you thought Jones was an orc, but when it came
closer you saw his second head. He wears an animal skin dress,
filthy and moth eaten. Jones really stinks...

name: oldstyle herald mouse killer ettin
longDescription: Herald 'Mouse-Killer' the ettin is standing here looking confused at you.
description:
When you look at Herald, you feel pity. His dress are really poor,
and the one of his heads hangs down. At the rope around his stomach
hangs dead mouses and rats. He does not smell good.

name: oldstyle master mind mindflayer
longDescription: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.
description:
It's a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a
black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any
moment now. In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.

name: oldstyle senior mind mindflayer
longDescription: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.
description:
This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high. Dressed in purple and black,
and carrying a large mace in its hand. In the center of its head are four large
tentacles with very sharp points.

name: oldstyle junior mind mindflayer
longDescription: The junior mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.
description:
This mindflayer is six foot high. It has a small mace in its belt, and is
dressed in purple and black cloth. It has four small tentacles in the
center of its head.

name: oldstyle wererat rat were
longDescription: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.
description:
The wererat is about four foot tall. It looks very much like rat, except
that it is standing.

name: oldstyle rat gigantic
longDescription: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.
description:
The gigantic rat is about ten foot long from head to tail and has claws
the size of your head looking very nasty.

name: oldstyle dog cooshee
longDescription: A rather large dog is here, wandering the valley.
description:
A beast is the size of the largest common dog.  It has a greenish coat with
brown spots.  Its shape, along with its colors, make this cooshee almost
undetectable as it moves.

name: oldstyle elf valley
longDescription: A valley elf wanders here, cautious of your intrusion.
description:
This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and agile.  You see
hatred in his eyes, and you try to avoid his stare.  His tense body looks ready
to spring upon you, like a mountain lion stalking its prey.  He sees you
noticing him, and quietly disappears.

name: oldstyle elf valley
longDescription: A female valley elf wanders here, skirting between the tall grasses.
description:
This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile.
She glares at you, then quickly disappears before you see more of her.

name: oldstyle elf sentry valley
longDescription: A valley elf sentry stands here, then noticing you, attacks quickly!
description:
This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile.
He glares at your intrusion and attacks with menace.

name: oldstyle elf sentry valley
longDescription: A valley elf sentry stands here, then noticing you, attacks quickly!
description:
This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile.
She glares at your intrusion and attacks with menace.

name: oldstyle elf scout valley
longDescription: A valley elf scout wanders the valley, searching for intruders like you!
description: The elf notices your intrusion and attacks with determination.

name: oldstyle elf valley
longDescription: A valley elf is here, doing her duties.
description:
She is currently doing some menial chores, and ignores your intrusion except
when you are in her way.

name: oldstyle elf elder valley
longDescription:
A valley elf elder is here, studying.  He notices you.
A valley elf elder shouts 'You have intruded wrongly.  Be prepared to die!'
description:
This elf looks quite old, probably twenty or more times your age.  He looks
quite potent, though.

name: oldstyle elf elder valley
longDescription:
A valley elf elder is here, studying.  She notices you.
A valley elf elder says 'Your arrogance will be your end, human.'
description:
This elf looks quite old, probably twenty or more times your age.  She looks
quite potent, though.

name: oldstyle pyrohydra pyro hydra
longDescription: A big beast with many heads, each breathing fire, stares at you with malice.
description:
This big beast looks like a small red dragon, but has many more heads than a
regular dragon, too.  It doesn't look happy.

name: oldstyle hermit man old
longDescription: An old hermit sits here, smoking a pipe.
description: He looks old and feeble.

name: oldstyle talemon wizard mage
longDescription: An old mage busies himself with some chemicals.
description: Talemon looks harmless, but the fireballs he throws at you don't.

name: oldstyle guardian daemon
longDescription: A huge guardian daemon is here, watching the treasure.
description:
This daemon is unhappy with its summoned job, and is willing to take out it's
anger at you!

name: oldstyle wolf
longDescription: A wolf is here, looking for small prey.
description: The wolf is covered with brown hair.  It looks at you with fright.

name: oldstyle antelope
longDescription: An antelope is here, peacefully munching on grass.
description:
With horns and spots over coarse, brown hair, this beast is the spit and
image of ... an antelope.

name: oldstyle Guardian guard
longDescription: A Guardian of Hell stands here, keeping you the Hell out.
description:
The guardian is a stone devil, a hideous creation from the dark laboratories
of Hell.  Its black eyes stare into your soul with a hunger that makes you
shiver.  The guardian stands motionless before you.  Its rough grey skin
looks impervious to normal weapons.

name: oldstyle cityguard guard
longDescription: An Ofcol cityguard is standing here, making sure there is no trouble.
description:
This guard is surely a trained and skilled fighter.  He is fully armed and
armored, and he uses his equipment with a practiced precision.  Luckily for
you, this guard will only use his deadly skills for the good of the citizens of
Ofcol.

name: oldstyle pile coins
longDescription: A pile of gold coins lies on the ground.
description: A large sparkly pile of gold coins.

name: oldstyle marshall diana
longDescription: Diana, the Marshall of Ofcol, stands here proudly.
description:
Diana is a beautiful, powerfully built woman.  She wears platinum armor for
three reasons.  The first is to show she is strong enough to withstand the
weight.  The second is to show her rank of office.  The third is that platinum
is the hardest metal she can find.  She is willing to defend Ofcol to her
death.

name: oldstyle male dee demon
longDescription: The male demon Dee lies on the bed, waiting to please you.
description:
This is the most handsome male you have ever seen.  The well-defined
muscles on his naked body make your mouth water.

name: oldstyle derrick captain guard cityguard
longDescription: Derrick, Captain of the Guard, is here disciplining his guards.
description:
Derrick is a very big man.  He has acquired this station, not by brains or
charm, but by brute strength.  He had fought in three orc wars and is a
descendent of a surviving cityguard of old Thalos.  He believes that everything
has to be hard won to be kept, and that laxity is for the weak.

name: oldstyle female dee demon
longDescription: The female demon Dee lies on the bed, waiting to please you.
description:
This is the most beautiful female you have ever seen. The curves of her
naked body make you sweat and babble uncontrollably.

name: oldstyle jacklyn captain guard cityguard
longDescription: Jacklyn, Captain of the Citadel Guard, is here raising morale.
description:
Jacklyn is pale and wiry, but then, so are most other witches.  The fact that
Jacklyn is a mage and a warrior makes her the perfect captain of the citadel
guards.  Jacklyn is very beautiful, but whether it is due to her pale softness
or her magic, no one has ever found out.  She isn't very strong physically, but
she need not be.

name: oldstyle bar gold
longDescription: A shiny gold bar lies on the ground.
description: This gold bar must be worth bucks!

name: oldstyle jim blacksmith
longDescription: Jim the Blacksmith is here, selling his latest works of metal.
description:
Jim is big and brawny, just like what you'd expect of a blacksmith.  He is
smiling a very big smile, as he looks at your coins.  You wonder if he likes
the metals or the value of the coins.

name: oldstyle chicken pot pie
longDescription: A yummy looking chicken pot pie is here.
description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with chicken and vegetables.

name: oldstyle sam
longDescription: Sam is here, selling his leather works.
description:
Sam is a middle-aged workman.  He looks tired, but never too tired to get that
last sale from you.  He grins at you slightly.

name: oldstyle beef pot pie
longDescription: A yummy looking beef pot pie is here.
description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with beef and vegetables.

name: oldstyle madam tracy
longDescription: Madam Tracy is here, selling and buying little treasures.
description:
Madam Tracy is a bit old, but not to the point of senility.  Besides, she knows
the hard ways of this world and is ready for it.  She spends her time at the
shop, trading little things (for a wee bit of profit).

name: oldstyle vegetable pot pie
longDescription: A yummy looking vegetable pot pie is here.
description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with vegetables.

name: oldstyle marty
longDescription: Marty the meat store owner is here, selling you his choice meats.
description:
Marty is a big man.  He used to hunt the animals he sells, but now he lets his
son, Jim, raise and slaughter the animals for him.  Marty still knows how to
kill, though.

name: oldstyle damned soul
longDescription: A damned soul wanders aimlessly here.
description:
You see the faint silhouette of a person. Looking closely at it, you can barely
make out features that would identify it as the person it was in life.

name: oldstyle elizabeth farmer
longDescription: Farmer Elizabeth is here, selling the latest crop.
description:
Elizabeth is a very happy woman.  She can't believe the nice weather here in
Ofcol, and the great vegetables this land produces is unbelievable to her too.
Farmer Elizabeth smiles at you nicely, but you bet she is doing that just to
get a good price off of you!

name: oldstyle granny jenkins
longDescription: Granny Jenkins is here, running the still.
description:
Granny Jenkins is a feeble woman, but she knows her brew.  She might be very
old, but she is still in charge of the still.  She cackles lightly at herself
every time she tastes her whiskey, which is quite often!
Granny Jenkins cackles again.

name: oldstyle tortured soul
longDescription: A tortured soul screams out in pain.
description:
You see a unrecognizable person going through unheard-of and
indescribable torture. It screams out at you in pain and terror.

name: oldstyle jack
longDescription: Jack is here slaughtering away at the animals.
description:
Jack is the son of Marty, and you can see the family resemblance (especially in
their shared affinity for slaughtering animals.)  Jack leers at you as you
enter.  "Came by to watch, eh?", he asks.

name: oldstyle half-eaten person
longDescription: A half-eaten person lies here, writhing in agony.
description:
This poor soul looks as if he has been chewed on and spit out.  He writhes
He is in agony and terror as he gasps frantically for Death to answer his
desperate plea...

name: oldstyle Sarah farmer
longDescription: Farmer Sara is here, milking the cows.
description:
Farmer Sara is all covered with bits of straw and grime, but underneath all
that, she doesn't look that bad.  She smiles at you demurely, and goes back to
her work.

name: oldstyle living wall
longDescription: A wall stands here. Its surface seems to move and come to life...
description:
The wall consists of greying and sinewy flesh - faces, hands,
broken bones, feet, and toes jutting from the surface. You hear low moans
of horror, pain, and sorrow issuing from within.

name: oldstyle chicken hen
longDescription: A hen is here, squawking at your intrusion.
description:
The hen has yellow feathers and small wings.  It looks like a chicken, if
you've ever seen one.

name: oldstyle skeletal warrior
longDescription: A skeletal warrior wanders the planes of Hell.
description:
Rotting flesh and gore drop from the bones of this creature.
Its decaying eyes stare at you intently as it sees only your
delicious and juicy brain.

name: oldstyle cow
longDescription: A cow is here, munching on grass.
description: The cow is here happily grazing.  It moos at you and goes back to grazing.

name: oldstyle bloody severed arm
longDescription: A bloody severed arm lies here.
description:
The bloody arm of some poor, luckless individual.  The stench of the
gore-covered limb makes you want to retch.

name: oldstyle cow
longDescription: A cow is here, waiting to be milked.
description: The cow is just standing here.  She moos at you and otherwise ignores you.

name: oldstyle bloody severed foot
longDescription: A bloody severed foot lies here.
description: This bloody foot definitely wasn't a lucky one.

name: oldstyle horse young
longDescription: A young horse is here, grazing.
description:
The horse whinnies at you, then runs around you a few times, then just goes
back to grazing.

name: oldstyle bloody severed nose
longDescription: A bloody severed nose lies here.
description:
I wonder how the person that lost this smells...Hopefully not as bad as
this nose does...

name: oldstyle pig
longDescription: A pig is playing here, getting itself and you dirty.
description: The pig looks dirty.  It snorts and sniffs at you, then goes back to its slop.

name: oldstyle blood
longDescription: The blood in the fountain gurgles merrily.
description: You see gallons and gallons of thick red blood gurgling in the fountain.

name: oldstyle citizen man
longDescription: A citizen is here, smiling at you.
description:
The citizen smiles at you.  He is having a great day, and he wishes the same
for you.  He looks at you strangely, though, wondering why you are so armed and
armored.

name: oldstyle Lost soul
longDescription: A lost soul stands here looking lost.
description:
This soul is definitely clueless to as where he is. He holds a ticket
that reads #14349023402342039840293481234900049.

name: oldstyle citizen woman
longDescription: A citizen is here, smiling at you.
description:
The citizen smiles at you.  She is having a great day, and she wishes the same
for you.  She looks at you strangely, though, wondering why you are so armed
and armored.

name: oldstyle crispy critter
longDescription: A crispy critter is here, being burned to death.
description:
This was once a person.  Now it is only a charred and smoking hulk that
is being burned for eternity.  It screams out as the flames lick at its
body and devour its flesh...

name: oldstyle child boy
longDescription: A boy is here, playing tag and other kids' games.
description:
The little boy looks up at you and says, 'Hi.  Can I have a piece of candy?'
He then smiles and runs away, remembering his game.

name: oldstyle pile bones skeleton
longDescription: A decaying pile of bones lies on the ground.
description:
Stringy bits of flesh blow gently in the breeze. The bones rattle as you walk
by them.

name: oldstyle child girl
longDescription: A girl is here, playing jump jacks and other kids' games.
description:
The little girl looks up at you and says, 'Hi.  Can I have a pretty little
coin?'  She then smiles and runs away, remembering her game.

name: oldstyle manes sub-demon
longDescription: A manes wanders the planes of Hell, looking for something to kill.
description:
A gruesome sub-demon who used to be mortal, this is a semi-intelligent
creature who attacks, with nails and teeth, anyone it encounters.  It is
often fed upon by demon lords and princes.  Its green-and-red blotched
skin gives it a diseased and decaying look.  It somewhat resembles a
shadow or a ghost.

name: oldstyle maid woman
longDescription: A maid is here, cleaning the house and preparing the next meal.
description:
The maid startles at your presence.  'You are ruining my floors!  Wait till
Master and Mistress come back.  You will get me in trouble!  Shoo!', she says.
She hits you with her broom.

name: oldstyle prisoner raiden
longDescription: The prisoner of Hell, Raiden sits here for eternity.
description:
This is a sad individual. He smells strongly of the rotten food that has been
thrown at him. He sits here chained to the wall, banished to Hell forever by
the gods.

name: oldstyle Nyles
longDescription: Nyles the Bartender is here, ready to serve you up a good brew.
description:
Nyles is a hefty guy, who looks like he's waiting for the next bar fight to
join in.  He keeps an eye on you and his glasses, making sure you don't steal
any.

name: oldstyle prisoner hell
longDescription: A sad looking individual sits here, awaiting torture.
description:
She is sad-looking, indeed:  cuts and scrapes all over her.  Many scars
and burns cover her face and arms.  The appalling condition of her once-lovely
breasts makes you avert your eyes.

name: oldstyle cityguard guard
longDescription: An Ofcol cityguard is posted here to guard the gate.
description:
This guard is surely a trained and skilled fighter.  He is fully armed and
armored, and he uses his equipment with a practiced precision.  Luckily for
you, this guard will only use his deadly skills for the good of the citizens of
Ofcol.

name: oldstyle prisoner hell
longDescription: A sad looking individual sits here ,awaiting torture.
description:
He is sad-looking, indeed:  cuts and scrapes all over him.  Many scars
and burns cover his face and arms.  One of his arms is broken at the
elbow and hangs limply by his side.

name: oldstyle bard
longDescription: A bard is here, singing of the glories of Ofcol.
description:
After years of traveling around the world, this bard has decided to stay in the
peaceful city of Ofcol, and to sing of its unmatched glories.  He smiles at
you, hinting toward a tip from you in ever a subtle way.

name: oldstyle demonguard demon guard
longDescription: A demonguard patrols the planes of Hell.
description:
This very large demon stands before you, licking his daggerlike teeth.
Yellow spittle runs down the scales of his blackened skin.

name: oldstyle servant
longDescription: A servant is here, carrying the duties of the Keeper of the Golden Citadel.
description: The servant smiles good-naturedly at you, then goes on his duties.

name: oldstyle burning fool
longDescription: A burning fool is here, crisping away.
description:
You can barely make out anything on it. All you can make out are the flames
of Hell consuming it, and the smell of burning flesh.

name: oldstyle squire
longDescription: A squire is here, scurrying from duty to duty.
description: This young man smiles at you, but is too busy to chat.

name: oldstyle construction worker male
longDescription: A construction worker is here, welding pipework.
description:
He is the typical construction worker:  T-shirt, jeans, yellow hard hat.
As you look closer at the hard hat, you notice that it says:
'4th DEMONsion Construction Co.'

name: oldstyle page
longDescription: A page is here, sending a message to his knight.
description: The page smiles for you, asking if he can do you a favor too.

name: oldstyle construction worker female
longDescription: A construction worker, is here working riviting framework.
description:
She is the typical construction worker:  T-shirt, jeans, yellow hard hat.
As you look closer at the hard hat, you notice that it says:
'4th DEMONsion Construction Co.'

name: oldstyle priestess
longDescription:
The Priestess of Ofcol is here, blessing you
with her beatific smile.
description:
The Priestess of Ofcol is an old woman, perfectly at peace with herself and
with the world.  She devotes all her time to help teach you the ways of her
god, Bahamut.  The dragon symbol around her neck looks almost alive.

name: oldstyle fire devil
longDescription: A fire devil stands here with a box of matches, lighting up poor souls.
description:
It is an indescribably grotesque creature.  Its pale, green-yellow skin
erupts with blisters and puss.  As you look at it, it smiles at you with
sharp, blood-covered teeth.  This is definitely a face only a mother could
love.

name: oldstyle chaplain Jerrold
longDescription:
Jerrold, the chaplain of this Citadel, is here
directing the activities of the people around here.
description:
He smiles at you, with the enthusiasm of a little kid.  "What're you doing just
STANDING here, young man?  Go help that other squire there!", he yells.  He
turns to you and with a consipatory tone, whispers, "Kids!"

name: oldstyle wall fire
longDescription: A wall of fire is here, creeping slowly across the room.
description:
It is simply a large, door-sized wall of fire.  It slowly inches across the
room, burning everything in its path, including the poor souls that are chained
to the various posts around the room.

name: oldstyle dragonlord lord dragon
longDescription: A knight wearing the scales of a dragon stands here.
description:
This person looks almost like a dragon itself.  His golden scales gleam with
power.  He smiles at you with a vicious grin.  You're happy that he doesn't
look upset at your presence.

name: oldstyle hell hound
longDescription: A hell hound runs freely through the halls of hell.
description:
This freak of a canine is rusty red to red-brown in color. Its eyes glow a
ghastly red. Its sooty black teeth and tongue are covered with green spittle
that runs down its dung covered coat.

name: oldstyle dragon gold
longDescription:
An old dragon shimmering with the colors of this
cavern peers at you sleepily.
description:
This dragon's head is taller than you.  He is annoyed at your disturbance, but
realizing that you're no danger to him, he ignores you.  He waves to one of
his attendants to escort you away.

name: oldstyle frozen body
longDescription: A frozen body lies on the ground.
description:
As you look at the corpse, you recoil when you see that its eyes still
move.  They stare intently from its bluish face, as if pleading for your
help.

name: oldstyle attendant
longDescription: A person robed in gold is attending to the Keeper of the Citadel.
description:
This elder servant to the Gold Dragon is very loyal to him, willing to risk
his life for his liege.

name: oldstyle ice devil
longDescription: A Greater Ice Devil stands here, cheerfully freezing souls.
description:
This devil is a mix of bug, bird, humanoid, and who knows what else.
Its multi-faceted eyes stare everywhere. It goes about its business of
slowly and painfully freezing the damned souls, quickly thawing them
and then starting over. Every couple of minutes, it takes time out to
break an appendage off a nearby soul and beat the soul with it.

name: oldstyle dragonknight knight dragon
longDescription:
A person dressed in the scales of a gold dragon
stands here, guarding the Golden Citadel.
description:
This person looks like a dragon itself.  His golden scales gleam with power.
He smiles at you, showing very sharp teeth.

name: oldstyle cityguard guard
longDescription: An Ofcol cityguard is posted here to guard the gate.
description:
This guard is surely a trained and skilled fighter.  He is fully armed and
armored, and he uses his equipment with a practiced precision.  Luckily for
you, this guard will only use his deadly skills for the good of the citizens of
Ofcol.

name: oldstyle trapped soul ice
longDescription: A soul trapped under the ice gasps desperately for air.
description:
This poor soul has been incased in ice, almost as though it were caught
under an iceflow.  It will desperately gasp for air for a few minutes,
then will seem to die briefly.  Always, it is restored and begins thrashing
about again.

name: oldstyle half frozen body
longDescription: A half frozen body hangs on a meat hook.
description:
A large meat hook is imbedded deep within the back of the corpse. You
see small white maggots eating away at the body. The flesh seems to
move and wriggle with a life of its own...

name: oldstyle killer penguin
longDescription: A small penguin waddles around on the ice.
description:
What a cute little penguin! Wait, why is it looking at you that way?
HEY! Penguins don't have teeth!

name: oldstyle I-scream worker
longDescription: An I-scream worker runs from machine to machine.
description:
It moves about so frantically that you can't really get a chance to look at it.
It runs about screaming, 'I SCREAM, YOU SCREAM!

WE ALL SCREAM FOR I SCREAM!!!'

name: oldstyle Ice Screamer
longDescription: An Ice Screamer is yelling into empty cartons.
description:
He is dressed in a white jumpsuit with the words,

'Eye Spleen I Screamery'

written on it in large, yellow letters.

name: oldstyle Construction Foreman Demonic
longDescription: A Demonic Foreman sits here, looking at blueprints.
description:
This huge demon has somehow managed to fit himself into
a oversized, orange jumpsuit. The words,

'4th DEMONsion Construction Co.' are written on the
back in large, black letters.
He seems none too happy to see you.

name: oldstyle Secretary of Hell
longDescription: The Secretary of Hell sits here, watching the phones ring.
description:
This very sexy secretary seems to be just sitting here amusing herself
by watching the little lights on the telephone blink. She is oblivious
to your presence and seems fascinated by the phones.

name: oldstyle office worker hell
longDescription: An office worker from Hell is looking for a boss to piss off.
description:
Just looking at him makes your blood boil.
AAAAAAAAAAaaaaaaaaaaaarrrrrrrrgggggghhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!

name: oldstyle records worker
longDescription: A records worker is here, filing bad reports.
description:
You see a rather plain-looking office personel here, filing paperwork on
someone.

name: oldstyle santa claus
longDescription: Santa Claus is here, checking on who has been naughty...
description:
It's a jolly old man, with red cheeks and a roly-poly belly and a laugh
as jolly as you can get. Must be Santa Claus!

name: oldstyle high priest ell
longDescription: The High Priest of Hell is here, eating 'I Scream'.
description:
The dark, black robes hide most of his features, but you can nearly make
out his emaciated face beneath the hood.

name: oldstyle bowl blood
longDescription: A bowl of blood sits on the altar.
description: It is a wooden bowl filled with blood and bits of flesh.

name: oldstyle jury member
longDescription: A jury member sits here with a "Guilty" sign, waiting for the trial to begin.
description: It seems to be a lesser demon disguised as mortal. Fair trial?  Not likely.

name: oldstyle Judge Whopper
longDescription: Judge Whopper sits here, trying to think of a painful sentence.
description:
This is the High Judge of Hell. He has never found anyone innocent
and is notorious for his painful and harsh punishments.

name: oldstyle lawyer hell
longDescription: The Lawyer from Hell sits here, playing games on his laptop computer.
description: Slimy, sleezy, and with very sharp teeth... A lawyer all right...

name: oldstyle complaints officer
longDescription: The Complaints Officer is here, watching her favorite soap opera.
description:
She seems not to notice you, but is absorbed in her favorite soap,
'As The Hell Burns'

name: oldstyle bastard hiramoto
longDescription: The Bastard Hiramoto stands here, trying to learn Kung Fu from a book.
description:
He looks at you and says, 'I think my Kung Fu is no good'
and then goes back to practicing.

He is known to buy anything, and to sell anything sold to him.

name: oldstyle maintenance worker
longDescription: A maintenance worker is here, fixing stuff.
description: He is in a yellow jumpsuit with a large nuclear-warning symbol on the back.

name: oldstyle weeds
longDescription: A weed is growing out of the cement.
description: You see a nasty yellow-and-purple weed.

name: oldstyle stanley
longDescription: Stanley stands here, waiting to sell you one of his wonderful figurines.
description:
He is a crafty old fart who looks about 1000 years old, but his figurines
are pretty well-known.  He was rumored to have disappeared around Solace 100
years ago.

name: oldstyle half eaten horse carcass
longDescription: A half-eaten horse carcass is here being digested.
description:
This is what used to be a horse.  Hmm, maybe - it's hard to tell.  Half
of it has been digested already.

name: oldstyle stomach dragon
longDescription: A stomach dragon is here, digesting Big Mouth's food.
description:
A large, brown-and-green, slime-covered reptile, its function seems to be
to move to each food item and barf acid all over it.

name: oldstyle rancid turkey leg
longDescription: A rancid turkey leg sits in a pool of slime.
description:
It's one of those really nasty pieces of food in the refrigerator that
disappears, and you wonder if it just walked away....

name: oldstyle reactor specialist
longDescription: A reactor specialist sits here, checking on the reactor core.
description:
He is dressed in a black jumpsuit with a large nuclear-warning symbol on
the back.

name: oldstyle reactor worker
longDescription: A reactor worker sits here, monitoring various screens.
description:
He is dressed in a black jumpsuit with a large lighting bolt symbol on
the back.

name: oldstyle homer simpson
longDescription: Homer Simpson sits here, eating donuts.
description:
A balding fat man with jelly stains on his uniform.

He suddenly spills his coffee and shouts out, 'DOH!'
Warning lights blink rapidly as the coffee shorts out the control panel.
Homer calmly stands up, unplugs the control panel, and sits down
for a nap.

name: oldstyle devil's food cake
longDescription: A nice slice of devil's food cake is here, waiting to be eaten.
description: Mmmmmm...Don't you just want to take a bite?

name: oldstyle mad cook
longDescription: A mad cook is here, cooking up a storm.
description: He spots you and screams, 'Git awa froom mi food!  I'll kill you!'

name: oldstyle frantic lady
longDescription: A frantic lady is here, looking in vain for a sale and tearing her hair out.

name: oldstyle nuclear technician
longDescription: A nuclear technician is here, fiddling with his rad suit.

name: oldstyle stray proton
longDescription: A stray proton is here, whizzing about.

name: oldstyle radiation
longDescription: The radiation in the room does unknown things to you.

name: oldstyle chief engineer hell
longDescription: The Chief Engineer of Hell is here, playing with the panic button.
description:
He kinda reminds you of an old Bart Simpson.  He seems to be enjoying
the panic button at the moment, chuckling happily as workers on the
reactor floor below frantically check dials and gauges, while lights
are flashing and sirens are screaming in the background.

name: oldstyle Greater Fire Demon
longDescription: A Greater Fire Demon stands here, laughing at each scream he hears..
description:
This large, black-scaled demon laughs merrily as he watches poor souls
scream out in pain. He pokes and picks at the flesh of the damned who
were unlucky enough to be tortured close to him.  His black-taloned
nails rip slowly through their flesh as he cackles with glee at the
sounds of their unending pain...

name: oldstyle frozen side beef
longDescription: A frozen side of beef hangs on a hook.
description:
This enormous carcass looks as if it came from a small dragon or a very
large cow.

name: oldstyle guard dog
longDescription: A guard dog sits here, guarding the break room.
description: A vicious-looking pit bull / demon-dog mix is here, slobbering on the donuts.

name: oldstyle juicy steak
longDescription: A mouth-watering, juicy steak is here, steaming.
description: Mmmmmmm.....Steak....Mmmmmm...You feel your mouth start to water.

name: mage guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
description: An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here.

name: cleric guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
description: An older man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here.

name: warrior guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
description: A smaller man dressed in nothing but a tunic stands here waiting to train you.

name: thief guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
description:
A small elf dressed in black rests in the corner. As you enter he grabs
a knife an throws it at you. It lands the wall next to your left ear. We
will now begin, is all he says.

name: oldstyle receptionist
longDescription: A dark skinned, veiled woman greets you from behind the desk.
description:
This arabian beauty is obviously the daughter of some high ranking
official. As you attempt to sneak a peek under her veil you notice
a small moon-shaped birthmark on her left cheek.

name: oldstyle bartender
longDescription: An old withered mage/bartender leans against the bar.
description: He looks distracted as he pours five drinks at once without error.

name: oldstyle john brother singer lead
longDescription: Brother John, lead singer for the Lokettes, stands on stage.
description: You see the lead singer of the Lokettes lip synching to an old Zeppelin tune.

name: oldstyle panhandler
longDescription: A panhandler rests here.
description: A small skinny man rests here hoping to find a warm heart.

name: oldstyle panhandler
longDescription: A panhandler rests here.
description: A small skinny man rests here staring at your clothes.

name: oldstyle beggar
longDescription: A grubby beggar sits here in the filth.
description: This poor soul seems down on his luck, perhaps you might spare a dime?

name: oldstyle baker
longDescription: The baker stands here playing solitaire.
description: You see a large man in a white apron covered in flour from head to toe.

name: oldstyle shopkeeper
longDescription: The shopkeeper stands here.
description: You see a half-elf sitting on a stool behind his counter.

name: oldstyle Nabil shopkeeper
longDescription: Nabil, purveyor of exotic pets, is waiting to serve you.
description:
A large, well-fed shopkeeper, Nabil is adept at finding animals from all
parts of the world. He welcomes you warmly and offers to show you a pair
of priceless parrots.

name: oldstyle ahkeem tailor
longDescription: Ahkeem the tailor welcomes you to his store.
description:
This middle-aged man looks over you with disdain and quickly suggests a new
wardrobe.

name: oldstyle vera
longDescription: Vera the veggie lady beams as you look over her stand.
description: A tall slender elf stands before you smiling broadly.

name: oldstyle butch
longDescription: Butch the meatcutter stands here in his bloodied apron.
description:
This stocky dwarf has a mad glint in his eye as he twirls his cleaver
carelessly into the air.

name: oldstyle abdul armorer
longDescription: Abdul stands here, waiting to help you.
description:
Abdul returns your gaze with a steady eye. You quickly glance away under
his cold stare and place your order.

name: oldstyle igor weaponsmith
longDescription: Igor stands here doing... something.
description: You see a small dwarf with a large hump on his left shoulder.

name: oldstyle cassandra
longDescription: Cassandra stands proudly over her selection.
description:
You see a happy weather-worn face whose lines suggest many years on the
open sea. It is only through years of fishing that she is able to withstand
the smell that permeates the air.

name: oldstyle foreman man
longDescription: The foreman stands here screaming at the workers.
description:
A worried working dwarf stands here constantly making notes in his
book and looking at his watch.

name: oldstyle construction worker
longDescription: A construction worker steadily works here.
description: A large sweaty looking man doesn't even return your glance.

name: oldstyle statue
longDescription: The statue of Nati stands here.

name: oldstyle statue
longDescription: The statue of Alander stands here.
description:
Alander has been caught in the pose of casting a bolt of flame
down to some hapless victim.  He is dressed in the robes of a mage,
yet bears a sword carved into the glittering stone of his statue.

name: oldstyle statue
longDescription: The statue of Zump stands here.
description: A statue of a stocky, angry looking dwarf with a cigarette in his mouth.

name: oldstyle statue
longDescription: The statue of Nightshade stands here.
description:
A tall, swirling dark stone formed this statue.  As you peer at him
longer, it seems to chuckle.

name: oldstyle statue
longDescription: The statue of Satin stands here.
description:
The statue of Satin, a small elven woman in mage robes, smiles serenely
and her eyes twinkle with gentle humour.  You take a step back in fear.

name: oldstyle statue
longDescription: The statue of Shandra stands here.
description:
This statue poses the Lady of the Mountains in a simple robe, with
her long tresses sensibly pulled back from her smooth, smiling face.

name: oldstyle statue
longDescription: There a statue of Furey standing here.
description: A statue of Furey.

name: oldstyle statue
longDescription: The statue of Landru stands here.
description:
Landru is carved from shimmering polished hematite, and a smile seems
to flicker over his face.  A pair of dice are enclosed in one hand.

name: oldstyle aziz
longDescription: Aziz the Human Canon stands here.
description: You see nothing special...

name: oldstyle mustafah
longDescription: Mustafah the Human Robber stands here.
description: You see nothing special...

name: oldstyle fatima
longDescription: Fatima the Elven Invoker stands here.
description: You see nothing special...

name: oldstyle kareem
longDescription: Kareem the Dwarven Mercenary stands here.
description: You see nothing special...

name: oldstyle nomad merchant
longDescription: A nomad merchant looks you over.
description:
This robust fellow returns your gaze with a smile, but something inside
tells you not to trust him very far.

name: oldstyle bodyguard
longDescription: A bodyguard sizes you up.
description: The large half-orc quickly glances you over and returns to his duties.

name: oldstyle kid thief
longDescription: A skinny kid wanders around.
description: This small child sees you looking at him and quickly looks away.

name: oldstyle dockworker
longDescription: A strong dockworker walks by moving crates.
description:
Although seemingly dull witted, this hulking mass carries the huge
crates from the boats like so many lilies.

name: oldstyle man tax collector
longDescription: A small man walks around scribbling in a notebook.
description:
The city's tax collector walks from store to store collecting the
Sultan's fee for living in his grand city.

name: oldstyle gord
longDescription: Gord the Rogue stands here.
description: You see nothing special.

name: oldstyle caramon
longDescription: Caramon the Knight stands here.
description: You see nothing special.

name: oldstyle raistlin
longDescription: Raistlin, the Arch-Magician stands here.
description: You see nothing special.

name: oldstyle curley greenleaf
longDescription: Curley GreenLeaf stands here.
description: You see nothing special.

name: oldstyle man wandering prophet
longDescription: A small grey-haired man walks around spouting gospel.
description:
This sad case may have been an evangelist in another lifetime. He is known
to stand on corners and accost passers-by with his doomsday preaching.

name: oldstyle alley cat feline
longDescription: A small harmless feline searches for food.
description: You see a small starved cat.

name: oldstyle vulture
longDescription: A vulture circles above you.
description: As you look up at this bird, you see the only thing it wants is a corpse.

name: oldstyle old man
longDescription: An old man sits here playing chess.
description: He seems intent on winning.

name: oldstyle conan librarian
longDescription: Conan the Librarian sits behind a desk.
description: The huge hulking mass rises as someone asks him a question.

name: oldstyle dirt devil
longDescription: The wind kicks up some dust.
description: What you see before you is really a baby air elemental.

name: oldstyle lamia
longDescription: A lamia stands here.
description: A half snake half woman creature rears back to attack you.

name: oldstyle dervish
longDescription: A raggety dervish stands here.
description: This man looks like he could use a lot of rest.

name: oldstyle sultan
longDescription: The Sultan rests here on his throne.
description: You see a large wealthy man in red robes smiling at you.

name: oldstyle harem girl
longDescription: A lovely, veiled harem girl stands here.
description:
You see a dark skinned beauty, wearing almost transparent silks and
light blue viel. Her loyalty to the sultan is unwavering.

name: oldstyle jailer
longDescription: The Jailer sleeps here, snoring loudly.
description:
You see a pathetic soul lying here. Some ex-nobleman that has fallen
out of grace with the Sultan.

name: oldstyle eunuch
longDescription: A eunuch stands here watching over the girls.
description:
You see a large man whose only duty is to protect the harem. He has been
castrated for the ladies' safety.

name: oldstyle sultans favorite girl nichole
longDescription: Nichole, the sultan's favorite girl rests on a mound of pillows.
description:
You see the most beautiful arabian girl that has ever met your eyes. Too
bad she's about to kill you.

name: oldstyle allah
longDescription: Allah is here.
description: You see the all-knowing Allah.

name: oldstyle mage guildguard
longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Mages stand here.
description: This man looks like a mage/warrior, i wouldn't mess with him.

name: oldstyle cleric guildguard
longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Clerics stands here.
description: This man looks like a cleric/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

name: oldstyle warrior guildguard
longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Warriors stands here.
description: The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.

name: oldstyle thief guildguard
longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of theives stands here.
description:
You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you enter
and steps to bar your way. You notice his hands resting on two sheafs.

name: oldstyle servant boy
longDescription: A servant boy is here running errands.
description: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.

name: oldstyle sultans guard
longDescription: A guard stands here, protecting the innocent.
description: You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need.

name: oldstyle sultans guard
longDescription: A guard stands here, watching the gate.
description: You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city.

name: oldstyle sultans guard chief
longDescription: The chief of the sultan's guard stands here.
description: You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing.

name: oldstyle mercenary
longDescription: A mercenary stands here waiting for a job.
description: You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out.

name: oldstyle shipwright captain
longDescription: An old captain rests here carving on a stick.
description:
You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat. He
beams a smile at you through his beard as you walk in.

name: oldstyle blacksmith
longDescription: The blacksmith stands here pumping air into his fire.
description:
You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you. He takes a
break from his swealtering work to bid you welcome.

name: oldstyle horse
longDescription: A horse stands here.
description: You see one of the fine arabian beasts known about the land.

name: oldstyle tourist
longDescription: A tourist stands here looking lost.
description:
You see a small round japanese man, with a camera around his neck and
a nose guard. He's looking at a small road map that he seems to be holding
upside down.

name: oldstyle shelbye
longDescription: Shelbye stands here.
description: You see nothing special.

name: oldstyle cryohydra
longDescription: The cryohydra stands here.
description: A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you.

name: oldstyle giant minotaur lizard
longDescription: The minotaur lizard stands here.
description: A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur.

name: oldstyle dog death
longDescription: The death dog stands here.
description: A large two-headed hound barks at you viciously.

name: oldstyle lion spotted
longDescription: The spotted lion stands here.
description: A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you.

name: oldstyle behir
longDescription: A behir slithers on the ground.
description: You see a large snake like reptile with more than a dozen legs.

name: oldstyle chimera
longDescription: A creature with three heads: lion, goat, and dragon stands here.
description:
The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored. This creature has
the hindquarters of a goat, the forepaws of a lion and the body of a red
dragon.

name: oldstyle couatl
longDescription: A couatl hovers here.
description:
A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the
color of the rainbow.

name: oldstyle giant hornet
longDescription: The giant hornet hovers here.
description:
The giant hornet hits you very hard!
You wish you wounds would stop BLEEDING so much!

name: oldstyle pegasus
longDescription: The pegasus stands here, flexing its wings.
description:
A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the arabian
thoroughbred you've seen in the stables.

name: oldstyle elvira
longDescription: Elvira stands here mixing a love potion.
description:
You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing
hair to match her outfit.

name: oldstyle braheem
longDescription: Braheem stands here talking to the walls.
description: You see a powerful but slighty insane mage.

name: oldstyle high priest
longDescription: The high priest rests here meditating, well he WAS meditating.
description: He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him.

name: oldstyle royal guard elite
longDescription: An Elite Royal Guard stands here smiling happily.
description:
You see one of the Royal Guards from Midgaard who seems to have gone
through some training.

name: oldstyle patch bartender
longDescription: A large half-orc with a patch over one eye pours beer behind the counter
description:
You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner
or another.

name: oldstyle stitch
longDescription: Stitch, the leather dude reclines in his chair.
description:
You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for
some sucker, um, customer to walk in his store.

name: oldstyle gardener small elf
longDescription: A small elf stands here tending the garden.
description:
A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls. He seems to be weeding
his garden.

name: oldstyle nightmare demon horse
longDescription: A large horse, black as night, stands here.
description:
You see the largest horse you have ever seen before. Standing 10' at the
shoulder he breathes flame from his nostrils and leaps to protect
his love.

name: oldstyle wolverine
longDescription: A large wolf like creature leaps out from the darkness.
description:
You see a half wolf- half human beast wearing a glove with long thin
blades on it.

name: oldstyle mimic painting
longDescription: You see an incredibly life-like painting of the Sultan's mother.
description: Boy is she ugly.

name: oldstyle mayor
longDescription: The Mayor of New Thalos stands here.
description: You see a chubby hobbit dressed in his best suit.

name: oldstyle chef
longDescription: The chef stands here making dinner.
description: You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes.

name: oldstyle ixitxachitl
longDescription: A very large ray with a wicked looking tail swims here.
description: You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail.

name: oldstyle guard bodyguard
longDescription: A bodyguard stands here.
description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
